sentences.chinese: 她从书桌的抽屉里拿出了一个文件夹。

sentences.english: The scissors are in the kitchen drawer (= drawer in a piece of kitchen furniture ) .
sentences.chinese: 剪刀在厨房的抽屉里。

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of furniture, such as a desk, that you pull out and push in and use to keep things in

sentences.english: The ticket is valid until March.
sentences.chinese: 这张票的有效期一直到 3 月份。

sentences.english: He waited until she had finished speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他一直等到她讲完。

sentences.english: Until recently, Anna worked as a teacher in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，安娜一直在日本当老师。

sentences.english: Up until last year, they didn’t even own a car.
sentences.chinese: 一直到去年，他们连汽车也没有。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time

name: passenger
trans: 旅客；乘客；过路人；碍手碍脚的人

sentences.english: Neither the driver nor the passengers were hurt.
sentences.chinese: 司机和乘客均未受伤。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is travelling in a vehicle, plane, boat etc, but is not driving it or working on it

name: key
trans: 键入；锁上；调节…的音调；提供线索

sentences.english: A bunch of keys hung from his belt.
sentences.chinese: 他的皮带上挂着一串钥匙。

sentences.english: Press the ‘Escape’ key to exit.
sentences.chinese: 按退出键退出。

sentences.english: Check your answers in the key at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 用书后的解答核对答案。

detailed_translations.english: a small specially shaped piece of metal that you put into a lock and turn in order to lock or unlock a door, start a car etc

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: He pushed in the clutch and coasted to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 他踩下离合器，滑行了一会儿便停下来了。

detailed_translations.english: if a car or bicycle coasts, it moves without any effort from you or any power from the engine
the area where the land meets the sea

sentences.english: Joe ran his tongue over his dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔舔了舔干燥的嘴唇。

sentences.english: The taste of the chocolate was still on her tongue.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力的余味依然留在她的舌尖。

sentences.english: The girl scowled at me, then stuck out her tongue .
sentences.chinese: 女孩怒视着我，然后吐了一下舌头。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part inside your mouth that you can move about and use for eating and speaking
to use your tongue to make separate sounds when playing a musical instrument

sentences.english: We love playing basketball.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱打篮球。

sentences.english: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。

detailed_translations.english: a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net

name: camel
trans: [畜牧][脊椎] 骆驼；打捞浮筒；工作作风官僚

sentences.english: The favorite, of course, is camel.
sentences.chinese: 最受欢迎的自然是驼色。

sentences.english: I wonder what the ECL on a half-camel is.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道半骆驼的有效人物等级是多少。

sentences.english: Earth tones are definitely big for this season, and camel will fit in with trends such as Queen's Country, Town meets Country and the like seamlessly.
sentences.chinese: 大地色无疑是这一季的主打，驼色也非常适合“王室风范”“大都市遭遇乡村风尚”这些流行系列，并且配合得天衣无缝。

detailed_translations.english: a large desert animal with a long neck and either one or two  hump s (= large raised parts )  on its back

name: Chinese
trans: 中国的，中国人的；中国话的

sentences.english: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

detailed_translations.english: relating to China, its people, or its language
people from China

name: speed
trans: 超速，加速；加速，迅速前行；兴隆
速度，速率；迅速，快速；昌盛，繁荣

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

sentences.english: She ran back to the classroom to get her schoolbag.
sentences.chinese: 她跑回教室去取书包。

sentences.english: I was straightening my schoolbag when you phoned me.
sentences.chinese: 你给我打电话时，我正在整理书包。

sentences.english: Mom, could you buy me a new green leather schoolbag?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，你能为我买一个新的绿色皮书包吗？

detailed_translations.english: A schoolbag is a bag that children use to carry books and other things to and from school

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

name: umbrella
trans: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

sentences.english: a teacher training college
sentences.chinese: 师范学院

sentences.english: Donna left school and went to art college.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜中学毕业后进了艺术学院。

sentences.english: Some people who want to go to college still can’t get there.
sentences.chinese: 有些想上大学的人仍然无法如愿。

detailed_translations.english: a school for advanced education, especially in a particular profession or skill

sentences.english: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.english: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.english: Mary showed great interest in the children.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映
detailed_translations.english: to let your feelings, attitudes, or personal qualities be clearly seen

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观
detailed_translations.english: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes

detailed_translations.chinese: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
detailed_translations.english: to let someone see something

sentences.english: I heard the clock strike six (= make six loud sounds ) .
sentences.chinese: 我听到钟敲了六下。

sentences.english: The station clock was ten minutes slow (= showed a time ten minutes earlier than the real time ) .
sentences.chinese: 车站的钟慢了十分钟。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows what time it is, in a room or outside on a building

sentences.english: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.english: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.chinese: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.english: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.chinese: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net

name: invention
trans: 发明；发明物；虚构；发明才能

sentences.english: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.english: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
sentences.chinese: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明，创造；捏造， 假话
detailed_translations.english: the act of inventing something

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: Do you want a cup of coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你要来杯咖啡吗？

sentences.english: Do you like your coffee white (= with milk ) or black (= without milk ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的咖啡要加奶还是不加奶？

detailed_translations.english: a hot dark brown drink that has a slightly bitter taste

name: cent
trans: 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）

sentences.english: A cup of rice which cost thirty cents a few weeks ago is now being sold for up to one dollar.
sentences.chinese: 几周前价值30美分的1杯米如今卖到了1美元。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）
detailed_translations.english: 1/100th of the standard unit of money in some countries. For example, there are 100 cents in one dollar or in one  euro  : symbol ¢.

name: purple
trans: 紫色的；帝王的；华而不实的

sentences.english: A purple may be made by dyeing a blue over a red.
sentences.chinese: 红色染上蓝色便可成为紫色。

sentences.english: She had a purple dress on with a silver-white necklace.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条紫色的连衣裙配着一条银白色的项链。

detailed_translations.english: a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
having a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue

name: film
trans: 在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影

sentences.english: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.chinese: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.english: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.english: a film of oil on the surface of the water
sentences.chinese: 水面上的一层油

detailed_translations.english: a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television

sentences.english: His mother always used to pick him up from school.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲以前一直去学校接他。

detailed_translations.english: a place where children are taught
to train or teach someone to have a certain skill, type of behaviour, or way of thinking

name: useful
trans: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的

sentences.english: useful information
sentences.chinese: 有用的信息

sentences.english: A little Japanese can be really useful.
sentences.chinese: 懂一点日语非常有用。

sentences.english: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能过来帮点忙？

detailed_translations.chinese: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: helping you to do or get what you want

name: dish
trans: 盘；餐具；一盘食物；外貌有吸引力的人
盛于碟盘中；分发；使某人的希望破灭；说（某人）的闲话

sentences.english: a serving dish
sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

sentences.english: I’ve looked everywhere but I can’t find the map.
sentences.chinese: 我到处都找过了，但就是找不到地图。

sentences.english: He’s travelled everywhere in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他走遍了欧洲各地。

sentences.english: The south should remain dry, but everywhere else will have heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 南部持续干旱，但其他地区会下暴雨。

detailed_translations.english: in or to every place

name: glad
trans: 高兴的；乐意的；令人高兴的；灿烂美丽的
(Glad)人名；(塞、瑞典)格拉德；(英)格莱德；(法、挪)格拉

sentences.english: We’re so glad you came.
sentences.chinese: 你来了我们真高兴。

sentences.english: ‘I’ve decided to accept the job.’ ‘I’m glad.’
sentences.chinese: “我决定接受这份工作。”“我很高兴。”

sentences.english: I’d be glad if you’d let me know when the funeral is.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能告诉我葬礼的时间，我将非常感激。

detailed_translations.english: pleased and happy about something

sentences.english: America was far richer in the nineties.
sentences.chinese: 90年代的美国要富裕得多。

detailed_translations.english: the number 90
the number 90

name: composition
trans: 作文，作曲，作品；[材] 构成；合成物；成分

sentences.english: Some minerals have complex chemical compositions.
sentences.chinese: 有些矿物的化学构成很复杂。

sentences.english: a composition by jazzman Dave Brubeck, called ‘Chromatic Fantasy’
sentences.chinese: 爵士音乐家戴夫•布鲁贝克的作品《半音阶幻想曲》

sentences.english: The Journals contain accounts of literary composition.
sentences.chinese: 《期刊》中有关于文学创作的报道。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is made up of different parts, things, or members

name: wing
trans: 翼；翅膀；飞翔；派别；侧厅，耳房，厢房
使飞；飞过；空运；增加…速度；装以翼

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

name: number
trans: 数；（杂志等的）期；号码；数字；算术

sentences.english: They wrote various numbers on a large sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一张大纸上写下了很多不同的数字。

sentences.english: Add all the numbers together.
sentences.chinese: 把所有数字加起来。

sentences.english: Answer question number 4.
sentences.chinese: 回答第4题。

detailed_translations.english: a word or sign that represents an amount or a quantity

name: polite
trans: 有礼貌的，客气的；文雅的；上流的；优雅的

sentences.english: She’s always very polite.
sentences.chinese: 她总是很有礼貌。

sentences.english: polite, well-behaved children
sentences.chinese: 懂礼貌、守规矩的孩子

sentences.english: a clear but polite request
sentences.chinese: 明确但客气的请求

sentences.english: It’s not polite to talk with your mouth full.
sentences.chinese: 满嘴食物时讲话是不礼貌的。

detailed_translations.english: behaving or speaking in a way that is correct for the social situation you are in, and showing that you are careful to consider other people’s needs and feelings

name: dismiss
trans: 解散；解雇；开除；让离开；不予理会、不予考虑

sentences.english: He just laughed and dismissed my proposal as unrealistic.
sentences.chinese: 他只是笑了笑，认为我的建议不切实际，拒绝考虑。

sentences.english: Bryant was unfairly dismissed from his post.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩特被无理免职了。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to consider someone’s idea, opinion etc, because you think it is not serious, true, or important

name: doctor
trans: 修理；篡改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

name: tired
trans: 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: He looks tired out (= very tired ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看起来累坏了。

sentences.english: ‘No,’ Frank said in a tired voice.
sentences.chinese: “不。”弗兰克语带疲倦地说。

detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want to sleep or rest

detailed_translations.chinese: 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）

name: crayon
trans: 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画

sentences.english: He coloured the picture with crayon.
sentences.chinese: 他用蜡笔给画上色。

sentences.english: They send letters — one time in crayon — detailing their rights and how I am violating some maritime treaty from the 1700s.
sentences.chinese: 他们寄信，有一次甚至是蜡笔写的，详细的描述了他们的权利和我如何违反了某些1700年代的海上条约。

detailed_translations.english: a stick of coloured  wax  or  chalk  that children use to draw pictures

detailed_translations.chinese: 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画
detailed_translations.english: to draw something with a crayon

name: interest
trans: 兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

name: wonderful
trans: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙

sentences.english: It’s wonderful what doctors can do nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 如今医生的本领着实令人称奇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙
detailed_translations.english: making you admire someone or something very much

name: mine
trans: 矿，矿藏；矿山，矿井；地雷，水雷

sentences.english: It was Glen’s idea, not mine.
sentences.chinese: 这是格伦的主意，不是我的。

sentences.english: ‘Is that your car?’ ‘No, mine is parked over the road.’
sentences.chinese: “那是你的车吗？”“不是，我的车停在路对面。”

sentences.english: You’ve got good legs – mine are too thin.
sentences.chinese: 你的腿很美——我的腿太细了。

sentences.english: His English is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 他英语比我好。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with himself or herself

name: wind
trans: 缠绕；上发条；使弯曲；吹号角；绕住或缠住某人

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

sentences.english: They had one daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一个女儿。

sentences.english: one hundred and twenty-one pounds
sentences.chinese: 121英镑

sentences.english: Come back at one (= one o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 1点钟回来。

sentences.english: Katie’s almost one (= one year old ).
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂快满一岁了。

sentences.english: The children seemed upset. One was crying.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子好像不开心，有一个在哭。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1
used to refer to a member of a group or pair of people or things

name: arm
trans: 手臂；武器；袖子；装备；部门

sentences.english: Dave has a broken arm .
sentences.chinese: 戴夫手臂断了。

sentences.english: Tim’s mother put her arms around him.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆的母亲伸出双臂搂着他。

sentences.english: Pat was carrying a box under his arm .
sentences.chinese: 帕特腋下挟着一个盒子。

sentences.english: He had a pile of books in his arms .
sentences.chinese: 他抱着一摞书。

sentences.english: They walked along the beach arm in arm (=  with their arms bent around each other’s  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们臂挽臂走在沙滩上。

sentences.english: The old lady rushed to greet him, arms outstretched .
sentences.chinese: 老太太张开双臂，快步上前迎接他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 手臂；武器；袖子；装备；部门
detailed_translations.english: one of the two long parts of your body between your shoulders and your hands
to provide weapons for yourself, an army, a country etc in order to prepare for a fight or a war

sentences.english: They were all there except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外他们都在那里。

sentences.english: We all went except him.
sentences.chinese: 除他以外， 我们都去了。

sentences.english: They all howled with laughter except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外，他们全都哈哈大笑起来。

sentences.english: At first there was a lack of trust between them.
sentences.chinese: 起初，他们之间缺乏信任。

sentences.english: an agreement made on the basis of mutual trust
sentences.chinese: 在相互信任的基础上达成的一项协议

sentences.english: You betrayed your father’s trust (= did something bad even though he trusted you ).
sentences.chinese: 你辜负了你父亲对你的信任。

sentences.english: I just don’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 我就是不信任他。

sentences.english: The money your father left you will be held in trust until you are 21.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲留给你的钱将被托管到你满21岁。

detailed_translations.english: a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something
to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

name: long
trans: 长时间；[语] 长音节；（服装的）长尺寸；长裤
长的；过长的；做多头的；长时间的；冗长的，长音

sentences.english: He longed to see her again.
sentences.chinese: 到那里去要多长时间？

sentences.english: She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon

sentences.english: The other hotels are all full.
sentences.chinese: 其他的宾馆均已客满。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about

sentences.english: a dozen eggs
sentences.chinese: 一打鸡蛋

sentences.english: Chris, Helen, and half a dozen others went on holiday together.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯、海伦和其他六个人一起去度假了。

sentences.english: (= about 12 ) cars were parked near the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 入口附近停了大约十二辆汽车。

detailed_translations.english: twelve

sentences.english: a fear of flying
sentences.chinese: 害怕坐飞机

sentences.english: Fearing violence, the group asked for police protection.
sentences.chinese: 该团体担心发生暴力事件，所以请求警方保护。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you get when you are afraid or worried that something bad is going to happen
to feel afraid or worried that something bad may happen

name: as
trans: 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.english: The new road should be completed before the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 这条新公路应该在年底前完工。

sentences.english: Let’s meet at our house before the show.
sentences.chinese: 看演出前在我们家碰头吧。

sentences.english: Larry arrived home before me.
sentences.chinese: 拉里在我之前到家。

sentences.english: We only got back from Scotland the day before yesterday (=  two days ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们前天才从苏格兰回来。

sentences.english: Other students joined in the protest, and before long (=  soon  ) there was a crowd of 200 or so.
sentences.chinese: 其他学生也加入了抗议队伍，不久就有200人左右了。

detailed_translations.english: earlier than something or someone

sentences.english: Tears streamed down their faces.
sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

detailed_translations.english: to flow quickly and in great amounts
a natural flow of water that moves across the land and is narrower than a river

sentences.english: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.english: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.chinese: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.english: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.chinese: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.english: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.english: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.chinese: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.english: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.english: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.chinese: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.english: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something

sentences.english: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.english: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

detailed_translations.english: to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change

sentences.english: It is important to reward good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 表现好要给予奖励，这是很重要的。

detailed_translations.english: the things that a person or animal does

name: room
trans: 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人
为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿

sentences.english: I looked around the room.
sentences.chinese: 我四下看了看房间。

sentences.english: She nodded toward a man who was standing across the room (= on the other side of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 她朝站在屋子另一头的一个男人点点头。

sentences.english: Someone was laughing in the next room (= the one beside the one you are in ) .
sentences.chinese: 隔壁房间有人在笑。

sentences.english: Here’s your key - room 348.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的钥匙——348号房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人
detailed_translations.english: a part of the inside of a building that has its own walls, floor, and ceiling

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿
detailed_translations.english: to rent and live in a room somewhere

name: disturb
trans: 打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒

sentences.english: Sorry to disturb you, but I have an urgent message.
sentences.chinese: 对不起打扰一下，我有个紧急消息。

sentences.english: The thieves fled when they were disturbed by a neighbour.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼们被一名邻居惊动后逃跑了。

sentences.english: (= a sign you put on a door so that people will not interrupt you ) .
sentences.chinese: 请勿打扰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒
detailed_translations.english: to interrupt someone so that they cannot continue what they are doing

sentences.english: ...the Russian parliament.
sentences.chinese: ...俄罗斯国会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Russia, its people, or its language
someone from Russia

sentences.english: her smiling face
sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸

detailed_translations.english: to make your mouth curve upwards, in order to be friendly or because you are happy or amused
an expression in which your mouth curves upwards, when you are being friendly or are happy or amused

name: strict
trans: 严格的；绝对的；精确的；详细的

sentences.english: a strict teacher
sentences.chinese: 严格的老师

detailed_translations.english: expecting people to obey rules or to do what you say

name: king
trans: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

sentences.english: On 2 December Henry VI was crowned king (= made the king at an official ceremony ).
sentences.chinese: 12月2日，亨利六世加冕为王。

detailed_translations.english: a man who rules a country because he is from a royal family

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

name: communication
trans: 通讯，[通信] 通信；交流；信函

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.english: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.english: Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

sentences.english: Shaving supplies, toothpaste, and soap were found inside.
sentences.chinese: 在里面找到了剃须用品、牙膏和肥皂。

detailed_translations.english: a thick substance that you use to clean your teeth

sentences.english: He took my hand in his.
sentences.chinese: 他握住我的手。

detailed_translations.english: of or belonging to him

name: value
trans: 值；价值；价格；重要性；确切涵义

sentences.english: The alterations doubled the value of the house.
sentences.chinese: 经改建后这所房子增值了一倍。

sentences.english: We decided to get the house valued.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定给房子估一估价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that something is worth
to decide how much money something is worth, by comparing it with similar things

sentences.english: She wanted to be the first woman to climb Mount Qomolangma, and she almost succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what you tried or wanted to do
to be the next person to take a position or job after someone else

sentences.english: He took her out for a five-course dinner in a fancy restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.english: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.english: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can buy and eat a meal

sentences.english: the ability to walk
sentences.chinese: 行走的能力

sentences.english: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to do something

sentences.english: He spooned instant coffee into two of the mugs.
sentences.chinese: 他用勺把速溶咖啡舀进了两个杯子里。

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for eating, cooking, or serving food. It has a small bowl-shaped part and a long handle.
to move food with a spoon

name: face
trans: 脸；表面；面子；面容；外观；威信

sentences.english: She had a beautiful face.
sentences.chinese: 她面容秀美。

sentences.english: Her face was white with fear.
sentences.chinese: 她吓得脸煞白。

sentences.english: A big smile spread across his face.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸上绽开了灿烂笑容。

sentences.english: I felt like punching him in the face.
sentences.chinese: 我真想给他脸上来一拳。

sentences.english: The birds build their nests in the rock face.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在岩壁上筑巢。

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your head, where your eyes, nose, and mouth are

sentences.english: I sat down and took off my shoes and socks.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来脱掉鞋子和袜子。

sentences.english: What size shoes do you take?
sentences.chinese: 你穿几号的鞋子？

detailed_translations.english: something that you wear to cover your feet, made of leather or some other strong material

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

name: produce
trans: 生产；引起；创作；生育，繁殖

sentences.english: New drugs are producing remarkable results.
sentences.chinese: 新药正在产生显著的效果。

sentences.english: a rise in sea level produced by climatic change
sentences.chinese: 由气候变化引起的海平面升高

sentences.english: As a policy, it did not produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 作为一项政策，它并未产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: a factory that produces microchips
sentences.chinese: 微芯片制造厂

sentences.english: He produced a letter from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他从口袋里掏出一封信来。

detailed_translations.english: to cause a particular result or effect

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

name: heavy
trans: 沉重的；繁重的，巨大的；拥挤的；阴沉的

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.english: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

name: electric
trans: 电的；电动的；发电的；导电的；令人震惊的

sentences.english: an electric blanket
sentences.chinese: 电热毯

detailed_translations.english: needing electricity to work, produced by electricity, or used for carrying electricity

sentences.english: The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片展示太阳系9个行星中的6个行星。

detailed_translations.english: A planet is a large, round object in space that moves around a star. The Earth is a planet.

name: weather
trans: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

sentences.english: a banquet for 250 distinguished guests
sentences.chinese: 250位贵宾出席的宴会

sentences.english: Among the invited guests were Jerry Brown and Elihu Harris.
sentences.chinese: 受邀的嘉宾中有杰里·布朗和伊莱休·哈里斯。

sentences.english: The actress was guest of honour (= the most important guest ) at the launch.
sentences.chinese: 这位女演员是首发式上的贵宾。

sentences.english: I’ve nearly finished the guest list for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 参加婚礼的嘉宾名单我差不多准备好了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is invited to an event or special occasion
for guests to use

sentences.english: From whom shall I get comfort?
sentences.chinese: 我从谁那儿能得到安慰呢?

sentences.english: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.chinese: 当时的争论是围绕着派谁去好这一问题而进行的。

name: hard
trans: 努力的；硬的；困难的；辛苦的；确实的；严厉的；猛烈的；冷酷无情的
努力地；困难地；辛苦地；接近地；猛烈地；牢固地

sentences.english: a hard wooden chair
sentences.chinese: 一把硬木椅

sentences.english: the hardest substance known to man
sentences.chinese: 已知的最硬物质

sentences.english: After months without rain, the ground was too hard to plough.
sentences.chinese: 数月无雨，土地坚硬难犁。

sentences.english: This year’s exam was much harder than last year’s.
sentences.chinese: 今年的考试比去年的难得多。

detailed_translations.english: firm, stiff, and difficult to press down, break, or cut

sentences.english: One man began to clap, and others joined in.
sentences.chinese: 一个人鼓起了掌，其他人也跟着鼓掌。

sentences.english: The couple were cheered and clapped on their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇抵达时人群为他们欢呼鼓掌。

sentences.english: The audience clapped politely but without much enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 观众礼貌地鼓了掌，但并不热烈。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your hands against each other many times to make a sound that shows your approval, agreement, or enjoyment
the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something

sentences.english: Sylvia fetched a towel from the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 西尔维娅从浴室拿来一条毛巾。

sentences.english: Fetch me a glass of water.
sentences.chinese: 给我拿杯水来。

detailed_translations.english: If you fetch something or someone, you go and get them from the place where they are

sentences.english: They reviewed each aspect of the plan bit by bit.
sentences.chinese: 他们对计划的各个方面逐一地进行了审核。

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

sentences.english: Some of these chemicals are very damaging to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些化学品中有些对环境非常有害。

sentences.english: legislation to protect the environment
sentences.chinese: 保护环境的法规

sentences.english: the effects of acid rain on the environment
sentences.chinese: 酸雨对环境的影响

sentences.english: the government minister for the environment
sentences.chinese: 负责环境事务的政府部长

detailed_translations.english: the air, water, and land on Earth, which is affected by man’s activities

sentences.english: He was a quiet shy man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个话不多、害羞的男人。

sentences.english: a shy smile
sentences.chinese: 羞怯的微笑

sentences.english: As a teenager, I was painfully shy (= extremely shy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我十几岁时害羞得很。

detailed_translations.english: nervous and embarrassed about meeting and speaking to other people, especially people you do not know
if a horse shies, it makes a sudden movement away from something because it is frightened

sentences.english: On the night the murder was committed , he was out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.english: The man accused of her murder will appear in court today.
sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.english: He was found guilty of attempted murder.
sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.english: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder.

trans: “非”（计算机中逻辑运算的一种）

trans: 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能

sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.chinese: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.english: She’s a dangerous enemy to have.
sentences.chinese: 与她为敌很危险。

sentences.english: an old enemy of her father

sentences.chinese: 他自豪地戴着奖章。

sentences.chinese: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统；（某组织的）最高权力人

trans: 机械，机器；机构；机械般工作的人

sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

sentences.english: a cold rainy day in October
sentences.chinese: 十月里一个寒冷的雨天

sentences.english: I hate rainy weather .
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌雨天。

sentences.english: the rainy season
sentences.chinese: 雨季

detailed_translations.english: a rainy period of time is one when it rains a lot

sentences.english: The candle flickered in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.english: The candle flickered and then went out.
sentences.chinese: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.english: When the candle was only half an inch high it flickered out and the room became dark.
sentences.chinese: 蜡烛只有半英寸长时，烛光忽闪忽闪地熄灭了，于是房间一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: a stick of  wax  with a string through the middle, which you burn to give light

sentences.english: Students must complete the course.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须学完这门课程。

sentences.english: The building took two years to complete.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼花了两年时间才完工。

sentences.english: The darkness was almost complete.
sentences.chinese: 几乎是漆黑一片。

sentences.english: a complete stranger
sentences.chinese: 一个完全陌生的人

detailed_translations.english: to finish doing or making something, especially when it has taken a long time
used to emphasize that a quality or situation is as great as it could possibly be

sentences.english: Lionel built a coop so that they could raise chickens and have a supply of fresh eggs.
sentences.chinese: 莱昂内尔搭建了一个鸡笼，这样他们就可以养鸡，得到新鲜鸡蛋。

sentences.english: roast chicken
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡

detailed_translations.english: a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs

sentences.english: The morning paper carried a story about demonstrations in New York and Washington D.C.
sentences.chinese: 晨报登载了纽约和华盛顿特区举行示威游行的报道。

sentences.english: The national TV network carries religious programmes.
sentences.chinese: 全国电视网播出宗教节目。

detailed_translations.english: if a newspaper, a television or radio broadcast, or a website carries a piece of news, an advertisement etc, it prints it or broadcasts it

name: sand
trans: 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子

sentences.english: a mixture of sand and cement
sentences.chinese: 沙和水泥的混合物

sentences.english: I have sand in my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我的鞋里有沙子。

detailed_translations.english: a substance consisting of very small pieces of rocks and minerals, that forms beaches and deserts

detailed_translations.chinese: 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子
detailed_translations.english: to make a surface smooth by rubbing it with  sandpaper  or using a special piece of equipment

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

sentences.english: We must have a meal together some time.
sentences.chinese: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.english: Dinner is the main meal of the day for most people.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭是大多数人一天中的主餐。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you eat food, for example breakfast or dinner, or the food that you eat on that occasion

name: lion
trans: 狮子；名人；勇猛的人；社交场合的名流

sentences.english: The wounded lion bellowed out.
sentences.chinese: 受伤的狮子发出了怒吼。

sentences.english: The lion bounded on the prey.
sentences.chinese: 那头狮子向猎物猛扑过去。

sentences.english: The savages darted spears at the lion.
sentences.chinese: 野蛮人们把矛掷向狮子。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane(= long hair around its neck ).

name: record
trans: 档案，履历；唱片；最高纪录

sentences.english: According to official records, five people were killed last year near that road junction.
sentences.chinese: 据官方记录，去年有五人在那个路口附近丧生。

sentences.english: His record reveals a tough streak.
sentences.chinese: 他的经历说明他个性坚强。

sentences.english: Her husband made her record every penny she spent.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫要她把花的每分钱都记下来。

detailed_translations.english: information about something that is written down or stored on computer, film etc so that it can be looked at in the future
to write information down or store it in a computer or on film so that it can be looked at in the future

sentences.english: Put the knives and forks on the table.
sentences.chinese: 把刀叉摆放在桌子上。

detailed_translations.english: a tool you use for picking up and eating food, with a handle and three or four points
to put food into your mouth or onto a plate using a fork

sentences.english: You can’t go anywhere until you’ve finished your homework.
sentences.chinese: 没完成家庭作业前你哪儿也不能去。

sentences.english: Have you finished that book yet?
sentences.chinese: 那本书你看完了吗？

sentences.english: ‘How’s the decorating going?’ ‘We’ve nearly finished.’
sentences.chinese: “装修进行得怎么样了？”“差不多快完成了。”

sentences.english: The football season finishes in May.
sentences.chinese: 足球赛季在 5 月份结束。

sentences.english: a dramatic finish to the race
sentences.chinese: 赛跑的戏剧性结局

detailed_translations.english: to complete the last part of something that you are doing
the end or last part of something

sentences.english: There’s so much to do. I don’t know where to start.
sentences.chinese: 有那么多的事情要做，我都不知道从哪里开始。

sentences.english: She wanted to start her own catering business.
sentences.chinese: 她想自己创立一家餐饮公司。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that you were not doing before, and continue doing it

sentences.english: No special license will be regranted to anyone from now on.
sentences.chinese: 特殊许可证今后不得向任何人再行发放。

sentences.english: Remind me to renew the driver's license.It will lapse next month.
sentences.chinese: 提醒我更换驾驶执照，它下个月就失效了。

sentences.english: The next time the client connects to the server, it will obtain another license.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端下一次连接到服务器时，它将获得另一个许可证。

detailed_translations.english: to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place

sentences.english: a ballpoint pen
sentences.chinese: 圆珠笔

sentences.english: a felt-tip pen
sentences.chinese: 毡头笔

sentences.english: a pen and ink drawing
sentences.chinese: 钢笔画

detailed_translations.english: an instrument for writing or drawing with ink

name: low
trans: 低的，浅的；卑贱的；粗俗的；消沉的

sentences.english: a low wall/building/table
sentences.chinese: 矮墙 / 建筑物 / 桌子

sentences.english: low clouds
sentences.chinese: 低云

sentences.english: jobs with low status
sentences.chinese: 社会地位低下的职业

detailed_translations.english: not high or tall

sentences.english: So who are your real friends and whose real friends are you?
sentences.chinese: 而谁是你的真正的朋友，你又是谁的真正的朋友呢？

sentences.english: That’s the man whose house has burned down. ＃
sentences.chinese: 就是那个男人的房子被烧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to

sentences.chinese: 他把我妹妹介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.english: He acquainted his classmate with my younger brother.
sentences.chinese: 他把我的弟弟介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.english: I, who am your classmate, can understand you.
sentences.chinese: 我是你的同班同学,能了解你。

sentences.chinese: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.english: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.english: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.chinese: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了。

detailed_translations.english: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them

sentences.english: a fence post
sentences.chinese: 篱笆桩

sentences.english: The exam results were posted on the bulletin board yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩昨天在布告板上贴出来了。

detailed_translations.english: a strong upright piece of wood, metal etc that is fixed into the ground, especially to support something
to put up a public notice about something on a wall or notice board

sentences.english: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
sentences.chinese: 配亮色衬衫的黑裤子

sentences.english: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

name: same
trans: 相同的；同一的；上述的（通常与the连用）；无变化的
同样的事物或人（通常与the连用）

sentences.chinese: 她身上的香水给我的感觉一如既往。

sentences.chinese: 他还是以前那个彼得——喜怒无常且爱发火。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相同的；同一的；上述的（通常与the连用）；无变化的
detailed_translations.english: used to say that a particular person or thing does not change

detailed_translations.chinese: 同样的事物或人（通常与the连用）
detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are exactly like each other
in the same way

sentences.english: By the time she was eight, she could read Greek and Latin.
sentences.chinese: 她八岁时就会读希腊文和拉丁文了。

detailed_translations.english: used as the past tense of ‘can’ to say what someone was able to do or was allowed to do in the past

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the key in a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.chinese: 我这一天尽是在东奔西跑。

sentences.english: The place was full of screaming children.
sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.english: He was threatening to burn the place down.
sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.english: She had never been back to the place where the accident happened.
sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

name: supermarket
trans: 超级市场；自助售货商店

sentences.english: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.english: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.chinese: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.english: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

detailed_translations.english: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes

sentences.english: What’s that noise?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么声音？

sentences.english: Try not to make a noise when you go upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 上楼时尽量不要弄出声。

sentences.english: There was a lot of noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.english: Noise levels have been reduced by 20%.
sentences.chinese: 噪音水平下降了20%。

detailed_translations.english: a sound, especially one that is loud, unpleasant, or frightening

sentences.english: The  boy thumped down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩咚咚地跑下楼梯。

sentences.english: The suitcase bounced down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 衣箱一路颠跳着滚下楼梯。

sentences.english: The children pattered down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们啪嗒啪嗒地跑下楼梯。

sentences.english: a man with a northern accent
sentences.chinese: 带有北方口音的男子

sentences.english: Northern Europe
sentences.chinese: 北欧

detailed_translations.english: in or from the north of a country or area

name: field
trans: 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

sentences.english: The boy bounced out of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩突然从教室里奔出去。

sentences.english: The students swarmed out of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 学生们蜂拥着跑出了教室。

sentences.english: She fainted in the classroom and was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 她在教室中昏过去了，并被抬了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a room that you have lessons in at a school or college

name: grade
trans: 年级；等级；成绩；级别；阶段

sentences.english: Pencils are graded according to softness.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔按软硬度分级。

sentences.english: The best grades of tea are expensive.
sentences.chinese: 最上等的茶叶价格很贵。

detailed_translations.english: to say what level of a quality something has, or what standard it is
a particular level of quality that a product, material etc has

sentences.chinese: 你在哪里学烹调的？

sentences.english: Cook the sauce over a low heat for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把这调味汁用低火烧十分钟。

sentences.english: slices of cooked ham
sentences.chinese: 熟的火腿片

sentences.english: a cooked breakfast
sentences.chinese: 做好的早餐

detailed_translations.english: to prepare food for eating by using heat
to prepare food for eating by using heat

name: him
trans: (Him)人名；(东南亚国家华语)欣；(柬)亨；(中)谦(广东话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: Are you in love with him?
sentences.chinese: 你爱上他了吗？

sentences.english: Why don’t you ask him yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不自己问他？

sentences.english: He repeated what she had told him.
sentences.chinese: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.english: I knew it was him as soon as I heard his voice.
sentences.chinese: 我一听声音就知道是他。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.chinese: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.english: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.chinese: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.english: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.chinese: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.english: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.english: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.english: His speech moved the audience to tears.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He made no move to come any nearer.
sentences.chinese: 他没有再靠近。
