name: wash
trans: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物

sentences.english: Those jeans need a good wash (= a thorough wash ).
sentences.chinese: 那条牛仔裤要好好洗一洗了。

sentences.english: I’ll just have a quick wash before we go out.
sentences.chinese: 我很快洗个澡，然后我们就出门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物
detailed_translations.english: an act of cleaning something using soap and water
to clean something using water and a type of soap

name: sunny
trans: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的

sentences.english: a warm sunny day
sentences.chinese: 温暖晴朗的一天

sentences.english: a sunny morning
sentences.chinese: 艳阳高照的上午

sentences.english: a nice sunny room
sentences.chinese: 阳光充足的房间

sentences.english: I hope it’s sunny tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望明天天晴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of light from the sun

name: rose
trans: 玫瑰；粉红色；蔷薇（花）；粉红色的葡萄酒
玫瑰花的；玫瑰色的；粉红色的；带有玫瑰香味的
使成玫瑰色，使（面颊）发红；使有玫瑰香味
起义( rise的过去式)；升起；（数量）增加；休会

sentences.english: a dozen red roses
sentences.chinese: 一打红玫瑰

sentences.english: A large bouquet of roses arrived on her desk.
sentences.chinese: 一大束玫瑰送到了她的桌子上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 玫瑰；粉红色；蔷薇（花）；粉红色的葡萄酒
detailed_translations.english: a flower that often has a pleasant smell, and is usually red, pink, white, or yellow, or the bush that this flower grows on

detailed_translations.chinese: 玫瑰花的；玫瑰色的；粉红色的；带有玫瑰香味的
detailed_translations.english: pink in colour

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成玫瑰色，使（面颊）发红；使有玫瑰香味
detailed_translations.english: to make rose-coloured; cause to blush or redden

detailed_translations.chinese: 起义( rise的过去式)；升起；（数量）增加；休会

sentences.english: On the seventh day of Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节的第七天。

sentences.english: Ash wednesday: the seventh wednesday before easter and the first day of lent on which many christians receive a mark of ashes on the forehead as a token of penitence and mortality.
sentences.chinese: 圣灰星期三，大斋首日：复活节前第七个星期三和大斋期的第一天，在这一天很多基督教都用灰在前额画一标记以作忏悔和必死的标志。

sentences.english: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座是黄道十二宫的第七宫。

detailed_translations.english: one of seven equal parts of something
one of seven equal parts of something

name: ground
trans: 地面；土地；范围；战场;根据
使接触地面；打基础；使搁浅
土地的；地面上的；磨碎的；磨过的

sentences.english: I found her lying on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她躺在地上。

sentences.english: a football/recreation/sports, etc. ground
sentences.chinese: 足球场、娱乐场地、运动场等

sentences.english: There are strong grounds for believing his statement.
sentences.chinese: 有充分的理由可以相信他的话。

sentences.english: ‘You’re under arrest.’ ‘On what grounds?’
sentences.chinese: “你被捕了。”“理由是什么？”

detailed_translations.english: the solid surface of the earth

sentences.english: The tree was probably a hundred years old.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树很可能已经有100年了。

sentences.english: They’ve had this argument a hundred times before.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题他们以前已经争论过无数次了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 100
a very large number of things or people

sentences.english: the largest ever gathering of world leaders
sentences.chinese: 全世界领导人史无前例的大聚会

detailed_translations.english: the person who directs or controls a group, organization, country etc

name: story
trans: 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话

sentences.english: a book of short stories
sentences.chinese: 短篇小说集

sentences.english: We cuddled together over a bedtime story .
sentences.chinese: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。

sentences.english: The film was based on a true story .
sentences.chinese: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.english: Don’t be frightened – it’s only a story (= it is imaginary ) .
sentences.chinese: 别害怕，这只是一个故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话
detailed_translations.english: a description of how something happened, that is intended to entertain people, and may be true or imaginary
to decorate (a pot, wall, etc) with scenes from history or legends

name: nose
trans: 鼻子；嗅觉；突出的部分；探问

sentences.english: Someone punched him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 有人一拳打在他的鼻子上。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person’s or animal’s face used for smelling or breathing

name: church
trans: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a building where Christians go to worship

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

sentences.english: Information is also available on women’s health care.
sentences.chinese: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.english: She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.
sentences.chinese: 她歌唱得好，而且还会吹长笛和弹钢琴。

sentences.english: The system was not only complicated but also ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 这套系统不仅复杂而且效率低。

sentences.english: My girlfriend was also called Helen.
sentences.chinese: 我的女朋友也叫海伦。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to something else that you have mentioned

name: fill
trans: 装满，使充满；满足；堵塞；任职

sentences.english: He poured her a drink, then filled his own glass.
sentences.chinese: 他给她倒了一杯，然后将自己的杯子斟满。

sentences.english: My job was filling the flour sacks.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是装面粉袋。

sentences.english: Take a deep breath and allow your lungs to fill.
sentences.chinese: 深吸一口气，让肺部涨满。

sentences.english: There was just enough wind to fill the sails.
sentences.chinese: 正好有足够大的风鼓满船帆。

sentences.english: Miller’s band was filling dance halls (= attracting a lot of people ) all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 米勒的乐队在全国各地的舞厅都人气爆棚。

sentences.english: Numerous pictures fill every available space.
sentences.chinese: 密密麻麻的照片填满了每一块空处。

detailed_translations.english: if a container or place fills, or if you fill it, enough of something goes into it to make it full

sentences.english: He sprang up from the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 他从沙发上猛然跳了起来。

sentences.english: She spread a sheet on the sofa for me.
sentences.chinese: 她为我在沙发上铺了一条单子。

sentences.english: There's enough space to have a sofa there.
sentences.chinese: 那里还有足够的地方放下一个沙发。

detailed_translations.english: a comfortable seat with raised arms and a back, that is wide enough for two or three people to sit on

sentences.english: In that region, Chile went from ninth to first, overall, as Chilean mobile web use increased by 3200% over the past year.
sentences.chinese: 智利从这一地区的第九跃升到第一位，因为智利的移动网络用户在过去一年增长了 3200% 。

sentences.english: The dollar rose by a ninth of a cent.
sentences.chinese: 美元升值了1/9美分

detailed_translations.english: coming after eight other things in a series
one of nine equal parts of something

sentences.english: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

sentences.english: The curtains were an inch too short.
sentences.chinese: 窗帘短了一英寸。

sentences.english: Rainfall here is under 15 inches a year.
sentences.chinese: 本地的年降雨量不到15英寸。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot.

name: hot
trans: 热的；辣的；热情的；激动的；紧迫的

sentences.english: a hot day in July
sentences.chinese: 7月炎热的一天

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

name: play
trans: 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

sentences.english: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.chinese: 那个邮递员负责这条投递线路。

sentences.english: The old man often stands here to watch out for the postman.
sentences.chinese: 老人常常站在这儿等邮递员。

sentences.english: At the door he met an intelligent postman coming out with letters for the morning delivery.
sentences.chinese: 他在邮政总局门口碰见一个伶俐的邮差，拿着信从邮局走出来，去送早班信。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to collect and deliver letters

sentences.english: She reached out to touch his arm.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.english: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.chinese: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.english: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.english: She felt a gentle touch on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

detailed_translations.english: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

sentences.english: young white males
sentences.chinese: 年轻的白种男性

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the race of people with pale skin

sentences.english: We had bacon and eggs for breakfast .
sentences.chinese: 我们早餐吃了熏肉鸡蛋。

sentences.english: I never eat breakfast .
sentences.chinese: 我从来不吃早饭。

sentences.english: After a hearty breakfast (=  large breakfast  ) , we set out for a hike.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃了一顿丰盛的早餐，然后出发去远足了。

sentences.english: a light breakfast
sentences.chinese: 简单的早餐

sentences.english: a working breakfast
sentences.chinese: 工作早餐

detailed_translations.english: the meal you have in the morning

sentences.english: If no one objects, I would like Mrs Harrison to be present.
sentences.chinese: 如果没人反对的话，我想请哈里森夫人出席。

detailed_translations.english: to feel or say that you oppose or disapprove of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 实物， 物体； 目的， 目标； 对象， 客体； 宾语
detailed_translations.english: a solid thing that you can hold, touch, or see but that is not alive

sentences.english: pure silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: a thin smooth soft cloth made from very thin thread which is produced by a silkworm

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

name: cheap
trans: 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的

sentences.english: cheap rail fares
sentences.chinese: 便宜的火车票

sentences.english: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.english: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.english: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )
sentences.chinese: 廉价商店

sentences.english: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.english: Cheap wine gives me a headache.
sentences.chinese: 我喝劣质的葡萄酒会头痛。

detailed_translations.english: not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected

name: public
trans: 公众的；政府的；公用的；公立的

sentences.english: We have to show that publishing this story is in the public interest (= helpful or useful to ordinary people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须证明刊登这篇报道有利于公众。

sentences.english: full public access to information
sentences.chinese: 公众对信息的充分知情权

sentences.english: Public opinion is gradually shifting in favor of the imprisoned men.
sentences.chinese: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.english: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.chinese: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.english: Their activities have been hidden from the public gaze (= people’s eyes or attention ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.english: He is adored by his public.
sentences.chinese: 他深受支持者喜爱。

detailed_translations.english: relating to all the ordinary people in a country, who are not members of the government or do not have important jobs
ordinary people who do not work for the government or have any special position in society

sentences.english: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
sentences.chinese: 温迪走过来，坐在我身边。

sentences.english: the table beside the bed
sentences.chinese: 床边的桌子

sentences.english: I was standing right beside her at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我就站在她的旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to or very close to the side of someone or something

name: main
trans: 主要部分，要点；体力；总管道
主要的，最重要的；全力的

sentences.english: The main reason for living in Spain is the weather.
sentences.chinese: 居住在西班牙的主要原因是天气。

sentences.english: What do you consider to be the main problem?
sentences.chinese: 你认为最主要的问题是什么？

sentences.english: Our main concern is that the children are safe.
sentences.chinese: 我们最关心的是保证孩子们的安全。

sentences.english: a summary of the main points of the agreement
sentences.chinese: 协议要点的总结

sentences.english: the main aim of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 会议的要旨

sentences.english: I’ll meet you outside the main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我在大门外等你。

sentences.english: the main bedroom
sentences.chinese: 主卧室

detailed_translations.english: larger or more important than all other things, ideas etc of the same kind

name: angry
trans: 生气的；愤怒的；狂暴的；（伤口等）发炎的

sentences.english: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.chinese: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.english: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.chinese: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.english: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.english: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.chinese: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.english: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.chinese: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

detailed_translations.english: feeling strong emotions which make you want to shout at someone or hurt them because they have behaved in an unfair, cruel, offensive etc way, or because you think that a situation is unfair, unacceptable etc

name: method
trans: 使用体验派表演方法的

sentences.english: traditional teaching methods
sentences.chinese: 传统的教学法

sentences.english: I think we should try again using a different method.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们应该用不同的方法再试一次。

sentences.english: effective methods for the storage and retrieval of information
sentences.chinese: 信息存储和检索的有效方法

detailed_translations.english: a planned way of doing something, especially one that a lot of people know about and use

name: accident
trans: 事故；意外；[法] 意外事件；机遇

sentences.english: Ken had an accident at work and had to go to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.english: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.chinese: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.english: a train accident
sentences.chinese: 火车事故

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone is injured or something is damaged without anyone intending them to be

sentences.english: It was a cold moonlit night.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒冷的月夜。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚睡得不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep

sentences.english: Will you be home over the summer vacation?
sentences.chinese: 暑假期间你在家吗？

sentences.english: Over a period of ten years he stole a million pounds from the company.
sentences.chinese: 他在10年间从公司偷走了100万英镑。

sentences.english: Can we talk about this over dinner?
sentences.chinese: 我们能否边吃饭边谈这个问题？

detailed_translations.english: during

sentences.english: Which football team do you support?
sentences.chinese: 你支持哪个球队？

sentences.english: kids playing football in the street
sentences.chinese: 在街上踢球的小孩子

sentences.english: My Dad took me to watch my first football match .
sentences.chinese: 爸爸带我去看了我人生第一场足球比赛。

sentences.english: a football club
sentences.chinese: 足球俱乐部

detailed_translations.english: a game played by two teams of eleven players who try to kick a round ball into the other team’s  goal

sentences.english: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.chinese: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.english: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.chinese: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

sentences.english: A snake slithered across our path.
sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

detailed_translations.english: an animal with a long thin body and no legs, that often has a poisonous bite
if a river, road, train, or line snakes somewhere, it moves in long twisting curves

name: fresh
trans: 新鲜的；清新的；淡水的；无经验的

sentences.english: I’ll just make some fresh coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我来重新煮点咖啡。

sentences.english: The report provides fresh evidence about the way the business was run.
sentences.chinese: 报告提供了有关该公司运营方式的新证据。

sentences.english: You’ll have to start again on a fresh sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 你得拿张新的纸重新开始。

sentences.english: The beans are fresh from the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这些豆子是刚从园子里摘来的。

detailed_translations.english: adding to or replacing something

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: the problems of everyday life
sentences.chinese: 日常生活中的问题

sentences.english: wearing everyday clothes
sentences.chinese: 穿平常衣服

sentences.english: a simple, everyday object
sentences.chinese: 简单的日常物品

sentences.english: Describe it in ordinary everyday language.
sentences.chinese: 用一般的日常语言把它描述一下。

detailed_translations.english: ordinary, usual, or happening every day

name: either
trans: 两者之中任一的；两者之中每一的
也（用于否定句或否定词组后）；根本
任一，两方，随便哪一个；两者中的一个或另一个

sentences.english: You can park on either side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 这条街两边都可停车。

detailed_translations.english: one or the other of two; it does not matter which

sentences.english: Judging by her past performance, Jane should do very well.
sentences.chinese: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.english: From past experience she knew that it was no use arguing with him.
sentences.chinese: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.chinese: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.english: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.chinese: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

detailed_translations.english: done, used, or experienced before now
the time that existed before the present

name: subject
trans: 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民
服从的；易患…的；受制于…的

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: Miss
trans: 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子

sentences.english: It was nice talking to you, Miss Ellis.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴与你交谈，埃利斯小姐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子
detailed_translations.english: You use Miss in front of the name of a girl or unmarried woman when you are speaking to her or referring to her

name: personal
trans: 人事消息栏；人称代名词

sentences.english: My personal view is that we shouldn’t offer him the job.
sentences.chinese: 我个人认为我们不该给他这份工作。

sentences.english: Style and colour are a matter of personal taste .
sentences.chinese: 款式和颜色是个人爱好问题。

sentences.english: She took full personal responsibility for all the arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 她个人对所有的安排承担全部责任。

sentences.english: When I went to her room all her personal belongings had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我到她房间时，她所有的私人物品都已不在了。

sentences.english: After Alan’s death, his mother received his personal effects .
sentences.chinese: 艾伦死后，他母亲接收了他的私人物品。

sentences.english: I know from personal experience that you can’t trust Ralph.
sentences.chinese: 根据我的亲身经验，我认为你不能相信拉尔夫。

sentences.english: the personal qualities needed to be successful in business
sentences.chinese: 生意成功所需要的个人素质

sentences.english: The car is for personal use only.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车仅供私人使用。

sentences.english: On a personal level he felt sympathy for them, but he had a job to do.
sentences.chinese: 从个人角度他很同情他们，但是他有任务在身。

sentences.english: celebrities with their own personal trainer
sentences.chinese: 拥有私人健身教练的名流

detailed_translations.english: belonging or relating to one particular person, rather than to other people or to people in general

sentences.english: Lucy had a bandage round her knee.
sentences.chinese: 露西的膝盖上缠着绷带。

sentences.english: a knee injury
sentences.chinese: 膝伤

detailed_translations.english: the joint that bends in the middle of your leg
to hit someone with your knee

name: note
trans: 笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子

sentences.english: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.english: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.chinese: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.english: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 注解在书末。

detailed_translations.english: something that you write down to remind you of something

sentences.english: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.english: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.chinese: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action

sentences.english: The offices are on the top two floors of the building.
sentences.chinese: 办公室在大楼最高的两层。

sentences.english: a farmhouse and other farm buildings
sentences.chinese: 农舍以及其他的农场建筑

sentences.english: There is a limited supply of land for building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑用地供应有限。

detailed_translations.english: a structure such as a house, church, or factory, that has a roof and walls

name: memory
trans: 记忆，记忆力；内存，[计] 存储器；回忆

sentences.english: He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.english: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
sentences.chinese: 数据储存在电脑的存储器里

detailed_translations.english: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

name: introduction
trans: 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

sentences.english: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.english: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
sentences.chinese: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.english: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.chinese: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

detailed_translations.english: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet

sentences.english: Visit your dentist twice a year for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth

name: loud
trans: 大声的，高声的；不断的；喧吵的

sentences.english: The book fell to the floor with a loud bang.
sentences.chinese: 书砰的一声掉落到地上。

sentences.english: The music was so loud that I had to shout.
sentences.chinese: 音乐太响了，我只得大声地喊。

sentences.english: ‘Who’s there?’ asked David in a loud voice.
sentences.chinese: “是谁？” 戴维大声问道。

detailed_translations.english: making a lot of noise

name: unit
trans: 单位，单元；装置；[军] 部队；部件

sentences.english: The family is the basic social unit of modern society.
sentences.chinese: 家庭是现代社会的基本单位。

sentences.english: control/display/filter etc unit
sentences.chinese: 控制/显示/过滤等装置

detailed_translations.english: a thing, person, or group that is regarded as one single whole part of something larger

sentences.english: It was forty five minutes before she returned.
sentences.chinese: 过了45分钟她才回来。

sentences.english: Alison decided to return home.
sentences.chinese: 艾利森决定回家。

sentences.english: He left his country, never to return.
sentences.chinese: 他离开了祖国，一去不复返。

detailed_translations.english: to go or come back to a place where you were before
the act of returning from somewhere, or your arrival back in a place
used or paid for a journey from one place to another and back again

sentences.english: She held out her left hand.
sentences.chinese: 她伸出左手。

sentences.english: a scar on the left side of his face
sentences.chinese: 他左脸上的伤疤

detailed_translations.english: your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart

sentences.english: I’ve only met her once.
sentences.chinese: 我只见过她一面。

sentences.english: Paul’s been to Wexford once before.
sentences.chinese: 保罗曾去过韦克斯福德一次。

detailed_translations.english: on one occasion only
from the time when something happens

name: dead
trans: 无生命的；呆板的；废弃了的

sentences.english: Her mother had been dead for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.english: Police are trying to contact the family of the dead man.
sentences.chinese: 警方在设法与死者的家属联系。

sentences.english: a pile of dead leaves
sentences.chinese: 一堆枯叶

sentences.english: the dead body of a young soldier
sentences.chinese: 一名年轻士兵的尸体

sentences.english: Two men were shot dead by terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子遭恐怖分子枪杀。

sentences.english: Magnus was found dead in his car.
sentences.chinese: 马格纳斯被人发现死在他自己的车里。

sentences.english: One man is still missing, presumed dead .
sentences.chinese: 仍有一人失踪，被推定已经死亡。

sentences.english: He suddenly had a heart attack and dropped dead .
sentences.chinese: 他突发心脏病猝死。

sentences.english: She was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 到达医院时她被宣告已经死亡。

sentences.english: His fellow climbers had left him for dead on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他的登山伙伴以为他已死，便把他留在山上走了。

sentences.english: We didn’t know if she was dead or alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道她是死是活。

sentences.english: When they found him he was more dead than alive .
sentences.chinese: 他们发现他的时候，他已奄奄一息。

sentences.english: Her parents were long dead .
sentences.chinese: 她父母早就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: no longer alive

name: example
trans: 作为…的例子；为…做出榜样

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家，例如墨西哥和日本，经常发生地震。

sentences.english: Her courage is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气是我们大家的榜样。

detailed_translations.english: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

name: butterfly
trans: 蝴蝶；蝶泳；举止轻浮的人；追求享乐的人

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

detailed_translations.english: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours

sentences.english: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.english: Her mother was recovering from a serious illness.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.english: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.chinese: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.english: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.chinese: 增进健康减少疾病的方法

detailed_translations.english: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill

name: article
trans: 文章；物品；条款；[语] 冠词
订约将…收为学徒或见习生；使…受协议条款的约束

sentences.english: The paper’s leading article (=  the main article  ) described the government as weak.
sentences.chinese: 该报社论称政府软弱。

sentences.english: newspaper articles
sentences.chinese: 报纸上的文章

sentences.english: household articles
sentences.chinese: 家居用品

sentences.english: Article 1 of the constitution guarantees freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 宪法的第一条保障宗教信仰自由。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine

name: swimming
trans: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

sentences.english: Swimming is great exercise.
sentences.chinese: 游泳是很好的锻炼。

sentences.english: a swimming club
sentences.chinese: 游泳俱乐部

sentences.english: We went swimming on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我们周六去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: the sport of moving yourself through water using your arms and legs

detailed_translations.chinese: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

sentences.english: Come on, let’s dance.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，我们跳舞吧。

sentences.english: The words danced before her tired eyes.
sentences.chinese: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

sentences.english: The waltz is an easy dance to learn.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹这种舞很容易学。

detailed_translations.english: to move your body to the sound and rhythm of music
a special set of movements performed to a particular type of music

name: tent
trans: 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿

sentences.english: We looked for a flat spot where we could pitch our tent (= put up our tent ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们寻找一个平缓的地方搭帐篷。

detailed_translations.english: a shelter consisting of a sheet of cloth supported by poles and ropes, used especially for camping

detailed_translations.chinese: 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿

sentences.english: All my friends do not smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友并不全都吸烟。

sentences.english: Then you must be my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 那么你一定是我的远亲了。

sentences.english: I didn’t really know your name – it was just a lucky guess.
sentences.chinese: 我并不知道你的名字―只是运气好猜中的。

sentences.english: a lucky charm
sentences.chinese: 吉祥符

detailed_translations.english: having good luck

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.english: It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk into town.
sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: Please call during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 请在办公时间来电。

sentences.english: There was a knock on the door in the early hours of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨时分有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

sentences.english: We met at 12 noon.
sentences.chinese: 我们中午12点见了面。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock in the daytime

name: funny
trans: 有趣的，好笑的，滑稽的；（口）稀奇的，古怪的，奇异的；有病的，不舒服的；狡猾的，欺骗（性）的，可疑的，不光明
滑稽人物；笑话，有趣的故事；滑稽连环漫画栏；（英）（比赛用）单人双桨小艇

sentences.english: the funniest man in Britain
sentences.chinese: 英国最滑稽的男人

sentences.english: If this is your idea of a joke, I don’t find it at all funny .
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得这是个玩笑，那我认为它一点也不好笑。

sentences.english: Luckily, when I explained the situation, he saw the funny side (= recognized that it was partly funny ) .
sentences.chinese: 好在我把情况解释了以后，他看到了好笑的一面。

sentences.english: His laughter stopped her mid-sentence. ‘ What’s so funny? ’ she demanded.
sentences.chinese: 他的笑声打断了她的话。“有什么好笑的？”她厉声问道。

sentences.english: What’s that funny smell?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么怪味？

detailed_translations.english: making you laugh

sentences.english: It was like one of those old John Wayne movies.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影有点像约翰•韦恩演的一部老片子。

sentences.english: We took the kids to the movies.
sentences.chinese: 我们带孩子们去看电影。

detailed_translations.english: a film made to be shown at the cinema or on television

sentences.english: She had read about it in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

sentences.english: a series of newspaper articles about life in Cuba
sentences.chinese: 刊登在报纸上的一系列关于古巴生活的文章

detailed_translations.english: a set of large folded sheets of printed paper containing news, articles, pictures, advertisements etc which is sold daily or weekly

name: out
trans: 出现；在外；出局；出声地；不流行地

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

sentences.english: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

sentences.english: There was a ladder propped up against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有一把梯子靠在墙边。

sentences.english: sailing against the wind
sentences.chinese: 逆风航行

detailed_translations.english: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support

name: discovery
trans: 发现，发觉；被发现的事物

sentences.english: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

sentences.english: The Hubble Telescope allowed astronomers to make significant discoveries about our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望远镜使天文学家对我们的银河系有了重大发现。

detailed_translations.english: when someone discovers something

sentences.english: The student trotted out his knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生炫耀他的知识。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university, school etc

sentences.english: And again in November.
sentences.chinese: 在十一月又一次。

sentences.english: Too much snow in November.
sentences.chinese: 太多的大雪在十一月。

detailed_translations.english: the 11th month of the year, between October and December

sentences.english: a Japanese car
sentences.chinese: 日本(汽)车

sentences.english: At least three British golf courses are now owned by the Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 现在英国至少有3家高尔夫球场为日本人所有。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Japan, its people, or its language
people from Japan

sentences.english: Please write in black ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水书写。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured liquid that you use for writing, printing or drawing

name: instruction
trans: 指令，命令；指示；教导；用法说明

sentences.english: (= I have been told ) to give the package to him personally.
sentences.chinese: 我接到的指示是亲手把包裹交给他。

sentences.english: Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要遵照医生的嘱咐。

sentences.english: The school gives instruction in first aid.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校教授急救课

detailed_translations.english: a statement telling someone what they must do

sentences.english: Why don’t you come over for supper on Friday?
sentences.chinese: 周五为什么不过来吃晚饭呢？

sentences.english: We had supper in a small Italian place.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一家意大利小餐馆吃了晚饭。

sentences.english: Have you eaten supper ?
sentences.chinese: 你吃过晚饭了吗？

detailed_translations.english: the meal that you have in the early evening

sentences.english: The Algarve is a paradise for fishermen whether river anglers or deep-sea fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔加维对河边的垂钓者或深海的渔民都是一个天堂。

detailed_translations.english: someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job

name: flower
trans: 成熟，发育；开花；繁荣；旺盛

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

name: lot
trans: （与形容词和副词连用）很，非常；（与动词连用）非常
分组，把…划分（常与out连用）；把（土地）划分成块

sentences.english: We’ve spent a lot on the children’s education.
sentences.chinese: 我们在孩子的教育上花费甚多。

sentences.english: ‘How many CDs have you got?’ ‘Lots.’
sentences.chinese: “你有多少张CD？”“多着呢。”

sentences.english: They drew lots for the right to go first.
sentences.chinese: 他们拈阄儿决定谁先走。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount or number
to choose sb/sth by lot

name: or
trans: (Or)人名；(中)柯(广东话·威妥玛)；(柬)奥；(土、匈、土库、阿塞、瑞典)奥尔

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。

sentences.english: ‘Do you think he’ll come back?’ ‘Maybe.’
sentences.chinese: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.english: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.chinese: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.english: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.chinese: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

sentences.english: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain

name: duty
trans: 责任；[税收] 关税；职务

sentences.english: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.english: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.english: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.english: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.english: Martin’s duties included cleaning the cars.
sentences.chinese: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.english: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 香烟税

detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

sentences.english: Davis was found not guilty on all counts .
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯受到指控的各项罪名均不成立。

detailed_translations.english: one of the crimes that someone is charged with

sentences.english: In the thirties, air travel really began to take off.
sentences.chinese: 在30年代，乘飞机旅行迅速流行了起来。

detailed_translations.english: the number 30
the number 30

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
sentences.chinese: 守球门

sentences.english: I scored the first goal.
sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

trans: 一半的；不完全的；半途的

sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

to almost do something but then decide not to do it

name: tie
trans: 领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负

trans: 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

trans: 第十二的，第十二个的；十二分之一的

sentences.chinese: 上校：自从孩子们的母亲去世以后，你是来照看他们的第十二位女家庭教师。

sentences.english: NIV] the fifth sardonyx, the sixth carnelian, the seventh chrysolite, the eighth beryl, the ninth topaz, the tenth chrysoprase, the eleventh jacinth, and the twelfth amethyst.
sentences.chinese: 第五是红玛瑙，第六是红宝石，第七是黄璧玺；第八是水苍玉；第九是红璧玺；第十是翡翠；第十一是紫玛瑙；第十二是紫晶。

trans: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师

sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

trans: 活着的；活泼的；有生气的

sentences.chinese: 这是一宗严重事故——他们能活着实属幸运。

sentences.chinese: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.chinese: 青草覆盖的平原被广阔的沼泽地所取代。

sentences.chinese: 我的钱包肯定是在这里的什么地方。

sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

sentences.chinese: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

name: twentieth
trans: 第二十的；二十分之一的

sentences.chinese: 他得了第二十名。

sentences.chinese: 如果你第二十，你得到奖牌吗？

sentences.chinese: 图蒂从前在班上总是名列前茅，但打从上回搬家后，名次已掉到五十个学童当中的第二十名。

sentences.chinese: 摘一个橙子，摘一个梨子。

name: smart
trans: 聪明的；巧妙的；敏捷的；厉害的；潇洒的；剧烈的；时髦的

sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛被烟熏得发痛。

sentences.chinese: 不，如果明天早上那熊猫还不走

sentences.chinese: 我们一路坐火车到因弗内斯。

sentences.english: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
sentences.chinese: 我们去公园散步吧。

sentences.english: a park bench
sentences.chinese: 公园长椅

sentences.english: a flat overlooking Hyde Park
sentences.chinese: 一套可以俯瞰海德公园的公寓

detailed_translations.english: a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc

name: born
trans: (Born)人名；(柬)邦；(英、西、俄、捷、德、瑞典、匈)博恩

sentences.english: a born athlete/writer/leader
sentences.chinese: 天生的运动员 / 作家 / 领袖

detailed_translations.english: having a natural ability or skill for a particular activity or job

sentences.english: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.english: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

name: nurse

sentences.chinese: 她也希望她的孩子可以受到良好的教育。

sentences.chinese: 喔唷， 这么大的西瓜!

sentences.chinese: 非常丑陋的男子

sentences.english: the ugliest building in town

sentences.chinese: 我把窗户关上你不介意吧？

sentences.chinese: 我来修一下车门，它关不紧。

sentences.chinese: 她听见门在她身后关上了。

sentences.chinese: 现在我要请大家最后干一杯来结束这次会议。

sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

sentences.chinese: 他1985年去世，终年76岁。

sentences.english: Her father died suddenly in an accident when she was only ten.
sentences.chinese: 她年仅10岁时父亲突然死于一场意外事故。

sentences.english: She died peacefully in her sleep at the age of 98.
sentences.chinese: 她在睡眠中安然辞世，享年98岁。

sentences.chinese: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

trans: 圆的；完全的；大概的；肥胖的
在周围；迂回地；朝反方向；挨个

sentences.chinese: 我们围桌而坐玩纸牌。

sentences.chinese: 大家围拢来！我有重要事情要宣布。

sentences.chinese: 我给钥匙穿了根链子挂在脖子上。

sentences.chinese: 舞厅很大，四周都是窗户。

sentences.chinese: 有一个漂亮的庭院，四周都是桌子。

trans: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的

sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的

trans: 免费的；自由的，不受约束的；[化学] 游离的
