sentences.chinese: 7月4日

sentences.english: one-fourth/three-fourths

detailed_translations.english: the fourth thing in a series
¼; one of four equal parts

sentences.chinese: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done to cure someone who is injured or ill

sentences.chinese: 阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。

sentences.chinese: 他们有他们的报酬。

sentences.chinese: 我的脉搏，她的脉搏，他们的脉搏。

sentences.english: In America, they go out with their friends.

trans: 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的

if two or more roads, lines, etc cross, or if one crosses another, they go across each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的

sentences.chinese: 她现在是一个寡妇。

sentences.chinese: 但是我们现在是一个更加四分五裂的社会。

sentences.chinese: 一本关于魔法的书

sentences.chinese: 一把魔剑

the power to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special actions

sentences.chinese: 请把窗户关上，好吗？

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 您在外面等好吗？

sentences.chinese: 请问谁能告诉我发生什么事了？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask someone politely to do something

trans: 电影；电影院；电影业，电影制作术

sentences.chinese: 此片正在当地影院上映。

sentences.chinese: 罗茜跑下楼去开门。

sentences.chinese: 查尔斯在楼下厨房里。

sentences.chinese: 她重新粉刷了楼下的房间，并把二楼封上了。

the rooms on the ground floor in a house

sentences.chinese: 奥列格的父母都不会说英语。

sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里的一堆脏碟子

sentences.chinese: 你怎么会弄得这么脏？

sentences.chinese: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

sentences.english: People are concerned about the quality of the air they breathe.
sentences.chinese: 人们关心他们所呼吸的空气的质量。

sentences.english: Relax and breathe deeply (=  take in a lot of air  ) .
sentences.chinese: 放松，深呼吸。

detailed_translations.english: to take air into your lungs and send it out again
to take air into your lungs and send it out again

sentences.chinese: 迈克揉了揉后颈。

sentences.english: You have a lot of tension in your neck muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你的颈部肌肉很紧张。

sentences.chinese: 他拍了拍马脖子。

sentences.english: She had a mass of golden hair, which she wore in a coil at the nape  of her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她有一头金发，盘在脖子后面。

sentences.english: The dog picked up the puppy and carried it by the scruff of the neck into the house.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗叼住小狗的后颈，把它叼进了屋子。

trans: 影响；势力；感化；有影响的人或事

sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

name: poor
trans: 贫穷的；可怜的；贫乏的；卑鄙的

sentences.chinese: 她家穷得甚至买不起新衣服给她。

sentences.english: an area where poor people lived

sentences.chinese: 该国自然资源匮乏。

detailed_translations.english: having very little money and not many possessions

sentences.chinese: 你星期天做什么？

detailed_translations.english: the day between Saturday and Monday

name: bit
trans: [计] 比特（二进位制信息单位）；少量；马嚼子；辅币；老一套；一点，一块

sentences.english: He’s taken the engine to bits .
sentences.chinese: 他把发动机拆开了。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of something

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.english: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.chinese: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.english: the delicious smell of new-mown grass
sentences.chinese: 新修剪的草坪的芳香

detailed_translations.english: very pleasant to taste or smell

name: operation
trans: 操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算

sentences.english: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 全部运算在三秒内完成。

detailed_translations.english: an action done by a computer

name: pool
trans: 联营；撞球；水塘；共同资金

sentences.english: They have a nice pool in their backyard.
sentences.chinese: 他们后院有个漂亮的游泳池。

sentences.english: a shallow pool suitable for children
sentences.chinese: 适合儿童的浅水池

sentences.english: pools of water with tiny fish in them
sentences.chinese: 有小鱼的一个个水池

detailed_translations.english: a hole or container that has been specially made and filled with water so that people can swim or play in it

sentences.english: The children skated on the frozen pond.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在结冰的池塘上滑冰。

detailed_translations.english: to move on skates
one of a pair of boots with metal blades on the bottom, for moving quickly on ice

name: wrong
trans: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
错误的；失常的；不适当的

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.english: We spent three days in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们在巴黎度过了三天。

sentences.english: She only leaves her house during the day.
sentences.chinese: 她只在白天出门。

sentences.english: It was a cold blustery day.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒风呼啸的冷天。

sentences.english: Kept in that dark cell, I could no longer tell whether it was day or night.
sentences.chinese: 我被关在那个漆黑的牢房里，不知是白天还是黑夜。

sentences.english: The day dawned (= started ) bright and clear.
sentences.chinese: 拂晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 24 hours

name: golden
trans: 金色的，黄金般的；珍贵的；金制的

sentences.english: golden hair
sentences.chinese: 金发

sentences.english: golden sand
sentences.chinese: 金色的沙

sentences.english: He wasted a golden opportunity when he missed from the penalty spot.
sentences.chinese: 他罚球没有命中，浪费了一个绝佳的机会。

detailed_translations.english: having a bright yellow colour like gold

sentences.english: I’ll excuse you this time, but don’t be late again.
sentences.chinese: 这次我原谅你，但别再迟到了。

sentences.english: Please excuse my bad handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 请原谅，我的字写得不好。

sentences.english: Can I be excused from swimming today? I have a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我今天能不游泳吗？我感冒了。

a reason that you invent to explain an action and to hide your real intentions

sentences.english: a lonely old man
sentences.chinese: 一个孤单的老人

sentences.english: Don’t you get lonely being on your own all day?
sentences.chinese: 你整天独自一人不感到寂寞吗？

detailed_translations.english: unhappy because you are alone or do not have anyone to talk to

name: silent
trans: 沉默的；寂静的；无记载的

sentences.english: The large house was silent and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大房子寂静荒凉。

sentences.english: At last the guns fell silent .
sentences.chinese: 枪声终于沉寂了下来。

sentences.english: Julie offered up a silent prayer that she would pass her exam.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉默默地祈祷，希望能通过这次考试。

sentences.english: Alan was silent.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦沉默不语。

detailed_translations.english: without any sound, or not making any sound

sentences.english: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

name: late
trans: 晚的；迟的；已故的；最近的

sentences.english: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.english: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.chinese: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.chinese: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.english: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.chinese: 商店星期四开门较晚。

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
after the usual time

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that makes a ringing sound, used as a signal or to get someone’s attention

sentences.english: the school science lab
sentences.chinese: 学校的科学实验室

detailed_translations.english: a laboratory

sentences.english: My grandson's birthday was on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 我孙子的生日是星期二。

detailed_translations.english: the son of your son or daughter

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

sentences.english: She’s got two daughters and one son.
sentences.chinese: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子。

sentences.english: our eldest daughter
sentences.chinese: 我们的长女

detailed_translations.english: someone’s female child

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: a meat pie
sentences.chinese: 肉馅饼

sentences.english: a selection of cold meats
sentences.chinese: 各种冷盘肉

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

sentences.english: I walked nervously up the garden path towards the front door.
sentences.chinese: 我提心吊胆地沿着花园的小道向前门走去。

sentences.english: a well-worn path across the grass
sentences.chinese: 草地上被踏出的小径

sentences.english: Follow the path along the river to the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 沿着河边的小路走到那座桥。

sentences.english: a path leading to the summer house
sentences.chinese: 通往避暑别墅的小径

detailed_translations.english: a track that has been made deliberately or made by many people walking over the same ground

sentences.english: Both Helen’s parents are doctors.
sentences.chinese: 海伦的父母都是医生。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about two people, things etc together, and emphasize that each is included

sentences.english: We walked slowly up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.english: She picked her jacket up off the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.english: paths leading up into the mountains
sentences.chinese: 通往山里的小径

sentences.english: Tim had climbed up a tree to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.english: Put up your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.english: The water was getting up my nose.
sentences.chinese: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.english: Karen lay on her back, staring up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.english: Are you sure you should be up?
sentences.chinese: 你肯定你该起床了吗?

sentences.english: These days they were up at the crack of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 这些天他们在破晓时就起床。

detailed_translations.english: towards a higher place or position
If you are up, you are not in bed

name: possible
trans: 可能性；合适的人；可能的事物

sentences.english: Is it possible to get tickets for the game?
sentences.chinese: 有没有可能弄到比赛的门票？

sentences.english: It might be possible for the documents to be sent over.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件也许可以发送过去。

sentences.english: Computer technology makes it possible for many people to work from home.
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术让很多人可以在家里工作。

sentences.english: I want to avoid the rush hour traffic if possible .
sentences.chinese: 如有可能我想避开交通高峰时间。

sentences.english: I walk or use public transport whenever possible .
sentences.chinese: 只要有可能我就步行或者乘坐公共交通工具。

sentences.english: We are doing everything possible to track down the killer.
sentences.chinese: 我们正竭尽全力追捕杀人凶手。

sentences.english: Our staff will help you in every way possible .
sentences.chinese: 我们的员工会尽力帮助你。

sentences.english: Even if it were technically possible , we do not have the money to do it.
sentences.chinese: 即使技术上可行，我们也没有钱去做。

sentences.english: She decided to stay as far away from him as was humanly possible .
sentences.chinese: 她决定尽可能离他远点。

detailed_translations.english: if something is possible, it can be done or achieved

sentences.english: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.chinese: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.english: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.english: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.english: The first thing to do is to give them food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

sentences.english: That’s a terrible thing to say .
sentences.chinese: 这话说得太难听了。

sentences.english: Getting more American ideas into British business would be a good thing .
sentences.chinese: 将更多的美国式理念注入英国商界会是一件好事。

sentences.english: ‘I did no such thing ,’ he protested.
sentences.chinese: “我没干过这样的事。”他抗议道。

sentences.english: I know a thing or two (= a lot ) about dogs.
sentences.chinese: 我对狗所知甚详。

sentences.english: In a democracy, it is no bad thing to be able to compromise (= it is good, even though it may not seem good ) .
sentences.chinese: 在民主国家，能够妥协并非就是坏事。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens

sentences.english: Burma borders on India.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.english: This book treats of the caste system in India.
sentences.chinese: 这本书论述了印度的种姓制度。

sentences.english: If you come to India for just one thing, this should be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只为一件事来到印度，那就到这儿来吧。

sentences.english: The Roman Swiss Army knife has a knife, spoon, fork, spike, spatula, and small pick.
sentences.chinese: 这种古罗马瑞士军刀包含了刀，勺，叉，长钉，抹刀和小鹤嘴锄。

detailed_translations.english: a  pickaxe

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.english: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.english: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

sentences.english: He carefully explained the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 他仔细解释了程序。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone about something in a way that is clear or easy to understand

sentences.english: social issues, such as unemployment and education
sentences.chinese: 失业和教育之类的社会问题

sentences.english: the country’s serious social problems
sentences.chinese: 该国严重的社会问题

sentences.english: a challenge to the social order
sentences.chinese: 对社会秩序的一个挑战

detailed_translations.chinese: 社会的； 交际的， 社交的
detailed_translations.english: relating to human society and its organization, or the quality of people’s lives

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

sentences.english: He’s only been in this job for nine months.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作才九个月。

sentences.english: We open at nine (= nine o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 我们9点开始营业。

sentences.english: Kay was taught by her mother till she was nine (= nine years old ).
sentences.chinese: 凯一直由她妈妈教到九岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 9

sentences.english: Nothing ever happens in this town.
sentences.chinese: 这镇上从来都不会发生什么特别的事。

sentences.english: There’s nothing in this box.
sentences.chinese: 这盒子里什么也没有。

sentences.english: There was nothing else the doctors could do.
sentences.chinese: 医生们没有别的办法了。

sentences.english: He had nothing more to say.
sentences.chinese: 他没有更多要说的了。

sentences.english: We know nothing about her family.
sentences.chinese: 我们对她的家庭一无所知。

sentences.english: I couldn’t just stand by and do nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我不能就那样袖手旁观。

sentences.english: I promised to say nothing about it to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我答应这件事对谁也不说。

sentences.english: We’ve heard nothing from her for weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我们好几个星期没有她的音信了。

sentences.english: There’s absolutely nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.chinese: 根本没有什么好难为情的。

sentences.english: ‘Do you know much about business?’ ‘Nothing at all.’
sentences.chinese: “你对做生意了解得多吗？”“一窍不通。”

sentences.english: She had eaten virtually nothing at supper.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭她几乎什么也没吃。

sentences.english: There’s nothing wrong with the data.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据没什么差错。

sentences.english: There’s nothing new about this.
sentences.chinese: 这没有什么新鲜的。

sentences.english: A brief search was made but they found nothing untoward.
sentences.chinese: 他们简单地搜查了一番，没发现任何异常。

sentences.english: She’s nothing like her brother.
sentences.chinese: 她一点都不像她的哥哥。

detailed_translations.english: not anything or no thing
to have no qualities or features that are similar to someone or something else

sentences.english: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.english: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.english: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作有六年了。

sentences.english: I’m looking for a new job.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一份新工作。

sentences.english: Your pension can be affected if you change jobs.
sentences.chinese: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。

sentences.english: Sam does odd jobs(= small jobs in the house or garden ) for friends and neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆为朋友和邻居打打零工。

detailed_translations.english: the regular paid work that you do for an employer

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a building where important  cultural, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

sentences.english: He concealed the key inside his tie.
sentences.chinese: 他把钥匙藏在领带里面。

sentences.english: The door had been locked from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 门从里面锁上了。

detailed_translations.english: in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part

sentences.english: You’ll just have to be patient and wait till I’m off the phone.
sentences.chinese: 你只能耐心点，等我打完电话。

sentences.english: She was tough but wonderful with her patients.
sentences.chinese: 她很严厉，但对病人很好。

detailed_translations.english: able to wait calmly for a long time or to accept difficulties, people’s annoying behaviour etc without becoming angry
someone who is receiving medical treatment from a doctor or in a hospital

sentences.english: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.english: Secondly,put some tomato paste on the bread.
sentences.chinese: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.english: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

detailed_translations.english: a round soft red fruit eaten raw or cooked as a vegetable

name: different
trans: 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

name: word
trans: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

sentences.english: Lady Spencer
sentences.chinese: 斯宾塞夫人

sentences.english: the lords and ladies of the court
sentences.chinese: 宫廷的贵族及夫人

detailed_translations.english: used as the title of the wife or daughter of a British noblemanor the wife of a knight

name: kite
trans: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动

sentences.english: She has a blue and green kite.
sentences.chinese: 她有一只蓝色和绿色的风筝。

sentences.english: The child tailed his kite.
sentences.chinese: 小孩儿给自己的风筝装了尾巴。

sentences.english: He tried to fly his kite.
sentences.chinese: 他试图放飞他的风筝。

detailed_translations.english: a light frame covered in coloured paper or plastic that you let fly in the air on the end of one or two long strings

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动

sentences.english: Some of the local people are suspicious of foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 有些当地人不信任外国人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who comes from a different country

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.english: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
sentences.chinese: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.english: The town made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentences.chinese: 该镇每周收一次垃圾。

detailed_translations.english: to say firmly that you will not do something that someone has asked you to do
waste material that has been thrown away

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

name: fire
trans: 火；火灾；炮火；炉火；热情；激情；磨难
点燃；解雇；开除；使发光；烧制；激动；放枪

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

name: perhaps
trans: 或许；（表示不确定）也许；（用于粗略的估计）或许；（表示勉强同意或其实不赞成）也许；可能

sentences.english: Perhaps she’s next door.
sentences.chinese: 她也许在隔壁。

sentences.english: Perhaps it will snow tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天可能会下雪。

sentences.english: It won’t take so long next time, perhaps.
sentences.chinese: 也许下次不用那么久。

sentences.english: ‘I don’t think you understand.’ ‘Well, perhaps not .’
sentences.chinese: “我想你不明白。”“嗯，也许吧。”

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something may be true, but you are not sure

sentences.english: I’ll have to ask my boss for a day off.
sentences.chinese: 我得向老板请一天假。

sentences.english: Since I’m my own boss (=  I work for myself, rather than for an employer  ) , my hours are flexible.
sentences.chinese: 我自己当老板，所以我的时间很灵活。

sentences.english: Five-year-old girls love to boss people around.
sentences.chinese: 五岁的女孩就爱支使别人。

detailed_translations.english: the person who employs you or who is in charge of you at work
to tell people to do things, give them orders etc, especially when you have no authority to do it

sentences.english: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.english: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

sentences.english: ...a pair of knee-high socks.
sentences.chinese: …一双齐膝的短袜。

detailed_translations.english: Socks are pieces of clothing which cover your foot and ankle and are worn inside shoes

sentences.english: yesterday’s meeting
sentences.chinese: 昨天的会议

sentences.english: They arrived the day before yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他们前天到的。

detailed_translations.english: the day before today
on or during the day before today

sentences.english: He dotted down those notes.
sentences.chinese: 他匆匆记下了那些注解。

sentences.english: She ganged up on me with those rough boys.
sentences.chinese: 她伙同那些粗野的男孩对付我。

name: success
trans: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物

sentences.english: The experiment was a big success.
sentences.chinese: 实验非常成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: when you achieve what you want or intend

name: website
trans: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）

sentences.english: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）
detailed_translations.english: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

name: steel
trans: 钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的

sentences.english: a steel bridge
sentences.chinese: 钢铁大桥

sentences.english: stainless steel(= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢小刀

detailed_translations.english: strong metal that can be shaped easily, consisting of iron and  carbon

sentences.english: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.chinese: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.english: The area has stunning scenery, beautiful beaches, and much more besides.
sentences.chinese: 那个地方有迷人的景色、美丽的沙滩，除此之外还有很多很多。

detailed_translations.english: used when adding another reason

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

sentences.english: You should have followed my advice.
sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.english: I left my music at home.
sentences.chinese: 我把乐谱落在家里了。

detailed_translations.english: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting

sentences.english: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.chinese: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.english: dangerous working practices
sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

detailed_translations.english: something that people do often, especially a particular way of doing something or a social or religious custom

sentences.english: It’s only eight days till Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.english: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.english: My parents died when I was eight (= eight years old ).
sentences.chinese: 我8岁时父母就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 8

name: seventy
trans: 七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代
七十的；七十个的；七十岁的

sentences.english: We lost touch during the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 我们在70年代失去了联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代
detailed_translations.english: the number 70

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十的；七十个的；七十岁的

detailed_translations.english: the number 70

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: His every utterance will be scrutinized.
sentences.chinese: 他说的每句话都会被细查。

sentences.english: She knows every student in the school.
sentences.chinese: 她认识学校里的每一个学生。

sentences.english: The buses go every 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车每隔10分钟发一班车。

detailed_translations.english: used with singular nouns to refer to all the members of a group of things or people

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡集聚在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
sentences.chinese: 母鸡卧窝。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female chicken

sentences.english: Would you like some bread with your soup?
sentences.chinese: 你喝汤时要吃点面包吗？

sentences.english: a loaf of brown bread
sentences.chinese: 一条黑面包

sentences.english: a piece of bread and butter
sentences.chinese: 一块黄油面包

detailed_translations.english: a type of food made from flour and water that is mixed together and then baked

sentences.english: He was a very nice person, always pleasant and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很好的人，始终彬彬有礼。

sentences.english: The only person who really said anything helpful was Jack.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个人真正说了些有用的话，就是杰克。

sentences.english: I like her as a person , but not as a boss.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢她这个人，但作为老板我就不喜欢了。

sentences.english: I still know quite a lot of people in the village.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然认识村里的很多人。

sentences.english: a group of young people
sentences.chinese: 一群年轻人

sentences.english: You have to sign for it in person.
sentences.chinese: 你必须亲自签收。

detailed_translations.english: a human being, especially considered as someone with their own particular character

sentences.english: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.chinese: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.english: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.chinese: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.english: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action

name: chalk
trans: 用粉笔写；用白垩粉擦；记录；规划
粉笔；白垩；用粉笔划的记号

sentences.english: He chalked the message on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他用粉笔把这条消息写在黑板上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用粉笔写；用白垩粉擦；记录；规划
detailed_translations.english: to write, mark, or draw something with chalk

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉笔；白垩；用粉笔划的记号
detailed_translations.english: soft white or grey rock formed a long time ago from the shells of small sea animals

sentences.english: half a kilo of cheese
sentences.chinese: 半公斤干酪

sentences.english: a cheese sandwich
sentences.chinese: 干酪三明治

sentences.english: Sprinkle with the grated cheese.
sentences.chinese: 撒上磨碎的干酪。

sentences.english: a selection of English cheeses
sentences.chinese: 精选英国干酪

detailed_translations.english: a solid food made from milk, which is usually yellow or white in colour, and can be soft or hard

name: sleepy
trans: 欲睡的；困乏的；不活跃的

sentences.english: The warmth from the fire made her feel sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 暖洋洋的炉火使她昏昏欲睡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欲睡的；困乏的；不活跃的
detailed_translations.english: tired and ready to sleep

sentences.english: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

detailed_translations.english: the number

name: pancake
trans: 薄烤饼；粉饼；平降（全称pancake landing）

sentences.english: The classic example is tossing a pancake so it flips over in mid-air.
sentences.chinese: 最经典的例子是摊薄饼的时候，颠勺时薄饼就会飞到半空中。

sentences.english: The package says baking and pancake mix, but the pancakes were not tasty without some major tweaking to the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 包装盒上说烤焙与薄饼面料混合，但没有添加一些主要调料，薄饼是不好吃的。

sentences.english: They are so-called “ pancake people ”, they no longer concentrate their energies on one area of interest, but instead choose to spread themselves thinly over a large area.
sentences.chinese: 他们就是所谓的“煎饼人”，他们不再将精力专注于某一个感兴趣的领域，而是让自己的关注点浅浅地散布在一个很大的范围。

detailed_translations.english: a thin flat round cake made from flour, milk, and eggs, that has been cooked in a flat pan and is eaten hot

sentences.english: I’ve got tons of work to do.
sentences.chinese: 我有很多工作要做。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 2,240 pounds or 1,016 kilograms in Britain, and 2,000 pounds or 907.2 kilograms in the US

name: hair
trans: 生长毛发；形成毛状纤维
毛发的；护理毛发的；用毛发制成的

sentences.english: Her hair was short and dark.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发又短又黑。

sentences.english: a short fat man with no hair on his head
sentences.chinese: 光头的矮胖男人

sentences.english: The cat has left white hairs all over the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 白色的猫毛掉得满沙发都是。

detailed_translations.english: the mass of things like fine threads that grows on your head

name: granny
trans: 奶奶；外婆；婆婆妈妈的人

sentences.english: ...my old granny.
sentences.chinese: …我的老奶奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奶奶；外婆；婆婆妈妈的人
detailed_translations.english: grandmother

name: cloud
trans: 云；阴云；云状物；一大群；黑斑
使混乱；以云遮敝；使忧郁；玷污

sentences.english: Dark clouds floated across the moon.
sentences.chinese: 乌云飘过月亮。

sentences.english: A cloud of steam rose into the air.
sentences.chinese: 一团水蒸气升到空中。

sentences.english: Fears of renewed terrorist attacks cast a cloud over the event (= spoilt the happy situation ) .
sentences.chinese: 对恐怖分子再次发动袭击的担心给这次活动蒙上了一层阴影。

detailed_translations.english: a white or grey mass in the sky that forms from very small drops of water

sentences.english: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

detailed_translations.english: very rarely or almost never

sentences.english: The telephone rang just as I was leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

detailed_translations.english: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
to talk to someone by telephone

name: race
trans: 属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门第
使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进

sentences.english: The race is on to develop more environmentally friendly forms of energy.
sentences.chinese: 人们正在竞相开发更环保的能源形式。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which one group of people tries to obtain or achieve something before another group does

name: computer
trans: 计算机；电脑；电子计算机

sentences.english: a huge global computer network
sentences.chinese: 巨大的全球计算机网络

sentences.english: the latest computer software
sentences.chinese: 最新的计算机软件

detailed_translations.english: an electronic machine that stores information and uses programs to help you find, organize, or change the information

sentences.english: Listen! There’s a strange noise in the engine.
sentences.chinese: 听！引擎发出奇怪的声音。

sentences.english: I told him not to go, but he just wouldn’t listen.
sentences.chinese: 我叫他不要去，可他就是不听。

detailed_translations.english: to pay attention to what someone is saying or to a sound that you can hear

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

name: may
trans: 可以，能够；可能，也许；祝，愿；会，能

sentences.english: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.english: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.english: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.english: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.english: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.english: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.english: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

sentences.english: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.english: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

detailed_translations.english: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain

name: everything
trans: 每件事物；最重要的东西；（有关的）一切；万事

sentences.english: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.chinese: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.english: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.chinese: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.english: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.chinese: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

detailed_translations.english: each thing or all things

sentences.english: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.chinese: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

sentences.english: Could I have tuna instead of ham?
sentences.chinese: 我可否要金枪鱼来代替火腿？

sentences.english: Instead of being annoyed, he seemed quite pleased.
sentences.chinese: 他没有生气，反而似乎很高兴。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc

sentences.english: I’ll show you to your room. Ours is next door.
sentences.chinese: 我带你去你的房间，我们的房间在你的隔壁。

sentences.english: The main difference between our brains and those of monkeys is that ours are bigger.
sentences.chinese: 我们的大脑和猴子的大脑之间的主要差别在于我们的要大些。

sentences.english: No, that’s not ours.
sentences.chinese: 不，那不是我们的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with us

sentences.english: Check your spelling and grammar.
sentences.chinese: 检查你的拼写和语法。

sentences.english: the rules of English grammar
sentences.chinese: 英语的语法规则

sentences.english: A dictionary lists the words, a grammar states the rules.
sentences.chinese: 词典收列单词，语法书讲解语法规则。

detailed_translations.english: the rules by which words change their forms and are combined into sentences, or the study or use of these rules

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?
sentences.chinese: 他们现在有几个孩子？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

name: she
trans: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: basket
trans: 篮子；（篮球比赛的）得分；一篮之量；篮筐

sentences.english: a shopping basket
sentences.chinese: 购物篮

sentences.english: a basket full of vegetables
sentences.chinese: 装满蔬菜的篮子

detailed_translations.chinese: 篮子；（篮球比赛的）得分；一篮之量；篮筐
detailed_translations.english: a container made of thin pieces of plastic, wire, or wood woven together, used to carry things or put things in

sentences.english: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
sentences.chinese: 他去买炸鱼薯条了。

sentences.english: The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.english: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.english: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.chinese: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.english: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他弹吉他唱民歌。

sentences.english: I missed supper and I’m starving!
sentences.chinese: 我没吃晚饭，现在饿极了！

sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person

trans: 录音；用带子捆扎；用胶布把…封住

sentences.chinese: 他深深地感到羞愧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人

to make someone feel ashamed

sentences.chinese: 黑色晚礼服

sentences.chinese: 他们分享我们的胜利。

trans: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的

sentences.chinese: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

trans: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共

name: the

sentences.chinese: 他向我描述了那个情景。

sentences.chinese: 他发电报要我去参加那个聚会。

sentences.english: The world exists, whether you like it or not.

name: love
trans: 恋爱；亲爱的；酷爱；喜爱的事物；爱情，爱意；疼爱；热爱；爱人，所爱之物
爱，热爱；爱戴；赞美，称赞；喜爱；喜好；喜欢；爱慕

sentences.chinese: 我爱你，特雷西。

name: brush
trans: 刷子；画笔；毛笔；争吵；与某人有效冲突；灌木丛地带；矮树丛；狐狸尾巴

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for cleaning, painting, making your hair tidy etc, made with a lot of hairs,  bristle s  , or thin pieces of plastic, fastened to a handle
