sentences.english: Naomi was only 17 when she got married.
sentences.chinese: 娜奥米结婚时才17岁。

sentences.english: There are only a few cars on the island.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛上只有几辆汽车。

sentences.english: It’s only eight o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 才8点钟。

sentences.english: I was the only woman there.
sentences.chinese: 我是那里唯一的女性。

detailed_translations.english: not more than a particular number, age etc
used to say that there is one person, thing, or group in a particular situation and no others

name: soon
trans: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿

sentences.english: It will be dark soon.
sentences.chinese: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.english: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.chinese: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿
detailed_translations.english: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens

name: friendly
trans: 友好的；亲切的；支持的；融洽的，和睦的

sentences.english: a friendly smile
sentences.chinese: 亲切的微笑

sentences.english: I’ve found a great pub – good beer and a friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 我找到了一家很棒的酒馆——啤酒好，氛围也亲切。

sentences.english: a friendly match against AC Milan
sentences.chinese: 与AC米兰队的友谊赛

detailed_translations.english: behaving towards someone in a way that shows you like them and are ready to talk to them or help them

sentences.english: the Great Wall of China
sentences.chinese: 中国的长城

sentences.english: We climbed over the wall into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们翻墙进了果园。

detailed_translations.english: an upright flat structure made of stone or brick, that divides one area from another or surrounds an area

name: weak
trans: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的

sentences.english: The illness left her feeling weak.
sentences.chinese: 疾病使她感到身体虚弱。

sentences.english: Poor light produces weak plants.
sentences.chinese: 光照不足，植物就生长不好。

sentences.english: The animal was weak from loss of blood.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物因失血而虚弱无力。

detailed_translations.chinese: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
detailed_translations.english: not physically strong

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.chinese: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

sentences.english: a railway company
sentences.chinese: 铁路公司

detailed_translations.english: a system of tracks along which trains run, or a system of trains

name: tool
trans: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
使用工具；用机床装备工厂

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

name: careless
trans: 粗心的；无忧无虑的；淡漠的

sentences.english: It was careless of him to leave the door unlocked.
sentences.chinese: 他忘了锁门，真是粗心大意。

sentences.english: a careless mistake
sentences.chinese: 粗心造成的错误

sentences.english: careless driving
sentences.chinese: 粗心驾驶

sentences.english: Careless talk can be disastrous for a business.
sentences.chinese: 谈话不慎有时会给企业带来灾难性的损失。

sentences.english: She gave a careless shrug.
sentences.chinese: 她漠然地耸了耸肩。

detailed_translations.english: not paying enough attention to what you are doing, so that you make mistakes, damage things etc

sentences.english: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

sentences.english: There is also a golf course five miles away.
sentences.chinese: 五英里外还有个高尔夫球场。

sentences.english: I’ll be back by five (= five o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我五点前回来。

sentences.english: The family moved to Canada when he was five (= five years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他五岁时全家移居加拿大。

detailed_translations.english: the number 5

sentences.english: European languages
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的语言

sentences.english: our European partners
sentences.chinese: 我们的欧洲伙伴

detailed_translations.english: relating to Europe or its people
someone from Europe

name: term
trans: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项
detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language
to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

sentences.english: yellow flowers
sentences.chinese: 黄花

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
to become yellow or make something become yellow

sentences.english: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.chinese: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.english: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

name: condition
trans: 决定；使适应；使健康；以…为条件

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

name: position
trans: 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位

sentences.english: Lie in a comfortable position .
sentences.chinese: 以一个舒服的姿势躺下。

sentences.english: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯正在考虑申请那个职位。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone is standing, sitting, or lying

sentences.english: Over 1,500 different species of fish inhabit the waters around the reef.
sentences.chinese: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.english: The stonefish is the most deadly of all fishes.
sentences.chinese: 石鱼是所有鱼类中毒性最强的。

sentences.english: You usually drinks white wine with fish.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒一般配鱼喝

sentences.english: Dad really loves to fish.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸很喜欢钓鱼。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, and uses its fins and tail to swim
to try to catch fish

sentences.english: The judge ruled that she should have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

detailed_translations.english: to make an official decision about something, especially a legal problem

sentences.english: Why are you crying?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么哭？

sentences.english: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.english: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.chinese: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
sentences.chinese: “我明天不能来上班。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.english: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.english: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.chinese: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.english: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

sentences.english: Eric went to Seattle to visit his cousins.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克到西雅图去看望他的表兄弟。

detailed_translations.english: to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest

sentences.english: Sue showed great courage throughout her illness.
sentences.chinese: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.english: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .
sentences.chinese: 他出事故后再驾车肯定需要很大的勇气。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being brave when you are facing a difficult or dangerous situation or when you are very ill

name: doll
trans: 洋娃娃；玩偶；无头脑的美丽女人

sentences.english: a small wooden doll
sentences.chinese: 一个小木玩偶

detailed_translations.chinese: 洋娃娃；玩偶；无头脑的美丽女人
detailed_translations.english: a child’s toy that looks like a small person or baby

sentences.english: Graduation ceremonies are held in early May.
sentences.chinese: 毕业典礼在5月初举行。

detailed_translations.english: the fifth month of the year, between April and June

name: spring
trans: 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet (= stood up suddenly ) and rushed after her.
sentences.chinese: 他腾地站起身，冲过去追她。

sentences.english: There are several hot springs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这地区有几处温泉。

sentences.english: With a spring, the cat leapt on to the table.
sentences.chinese: 猫一跃跳上桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly and quickly in a particular direction, especially by jumping
a place where water comes up naturally from the ground

sentences.english: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.chinese: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.english: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.chinese: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.english: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.chinese: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of people voted no.
sentences.chinese: 60%的人投了反对票。

sentences.english: If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.chinese: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

detailed_translations.english: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request

sentences.english: the look of joy on her face
sentences.chinese: 她脸上的喜悦表情

sentences.english: The garden was his pride and joy.
sentences.chinese: 这座花园是他的骄傲和乐趣所在。

detailed_translations.english: great happiness and pleasure

sentences.english: Hurry up! Everyone’s waiting.
sentences.chinese: 快点！大家在等着呢。

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 你在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经等了很长时间了。

detailed_translations.english: to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc
a period of time in which you wait for something to happen, someone to arrive etc

sentences.english: A trunk distinguishes the elephant.
sentences.chinese: 长鼻是象的特征。

sentences.english: So the part of the elephant I experience applies what we know about people and how we apply that to UX design.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我体验的那部分的大象就是我们对人的了解和我们将我们的了解应用于用户体验设计。

sentences.english: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

detailed_translations.english: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up

sentences.english: He wanted to ask her, but he didn’t dare.
sentences.chinese: 他想问她，但又不敢。

sentences.english: ‘I’ll tell Dad.’ ‘You wouldn’t dare!’
sentences.chinese: “我要告诉爸爸。” “谅你也不敢！”

sentences.english: How dare you accuse me of lying!
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢说我撒谎！

detailed_translations.english: to be brave enough to do something that is risky or that you are afraid to do – used especially in questions or negative sentences

name: general
trans: 一般的，普通的；综合的；大体的

sentences.english: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.english: ways to improve your general health
sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.english: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.chinese: 这个一般性原则有一例外

sentences.english: a four-star general
sentences.chinese: 四星上将

detailed_translations.english: affecting all or most people, places or things
an officer of very high rank in the army or air force

name: moment
trans: 片刻，瞬间，时刻；重要，契机

sentences.english: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.english: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.english: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.english: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.english: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.english: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.english: It was quiet for a moment, then Rae spoke.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

sentences.english: a glass bowl
sentences.chinese: 玻璃碗

sentences.english: a piece of broken glass
sentences.chinese: 一块碎玻璃片

sentences.english: the cathedral’s stained glass windows
sentences.chinese: 教堂的彩色玻璃窗

sentences.english: Nigel raised his glass in a toast to his son.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔举杯向儿子祝酒。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent solid substance used for making windows, bottles etc

sentences.english: Could we have the menu, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把菜单给我们，好吗？

sentences.english: a three course set menu
sentences.chinese: 三道菜的套餐

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant

name: wide
trans: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的

sentences.english: a man with a wide experience of foreign affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.english: Our aim is to bring classical music to a wider audience.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

detailed_translations.chinese: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations
opening or spreading as much as possible

name: course
trans: 科目；课程；过程；进程；道路；路线，航向；一道菜

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

sentences.english: Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
sentences.chinese: 巴思小姐，请你接待一下这位先生好吗？

sentences.english: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen .
sentences.chinese: 早上好，女士们，先生们。

sentences.english: An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
sentences.chinese: 一位老先生在火炉旁边睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a polite word for a man, used especially when talking to or about a man you do not know

name: open
trans: 公开的；敞开的；空旷的；坦率的；营业着的

sentences.english: He threw the door open and ran down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他猛地打开门，往楼下跑去。

sentences.english: an open window
sentences.chinese: 打开的窗户

sentences.english: The gates swung silently open.
sentences.chinese: 大门悄悄地打开了。

sentences.english: The bar door flew open and a noisy group burst in.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的门猛地弹开，冲进来一群吵吵闹闹的人。

sentences.english: All the windows were wide open (= completely open ).
sentences.chinese: 所有的窗户都大开着。

sentences.english: The museum is open daily in the summer months.
sentences.chinese: 夏季里这座博物馆每天开放。

sentences.english: Jack opened the window.
sentences.chinese: 杰克打开窗户。

detailed_translations.english: not closed, so that things, people, air etc can go in and out or be put in and out
to move a door, window etc so that people, things, air etc can pass through, or to be moved in this way

sentences.english: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.english: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.english: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.english: She took the early morning train.
sentences.chinese: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day

name: soft
trans: 软的，柔软的；温柔的，温和的；软弱的；笨的
柔性；柔软的东西；柔软部分

sentences.english: a baby’s soft skin
sentences.chinese: 婴儿细嫩的皮肤

sentences.english: The fur was soft to the touch.
sentences.chinese: 这皮毛摸起来很柔滑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 软的，柔软的；温柔的，温和的；软弱的；笨的
detailed_translations.english: having a surface that is smooth and pleasant to touch

detailed_translations.chinese: 柔性；柔软的东西；柔软部分

name: upstairs
trans: 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上

sentences.english: I went upstairs and had a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我上楼冲了个澡。

sentences.english: She’s upstairs in bed feeling ill.
sentences.chinese: 她身体不舒服，在楼上躺着。

sentences.english: Marsani moved into the upstairs apartment.
sentences.chinese: 玛萨妮搬进了楼上的公寓。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上
detailed_translations.english: towards or on an upper floor in a building
An upstairs room or object is situated on a floor of a building that is higher than the ground floor
one or all of the upper floors in a building

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

name: fifty
trans: 五十；五十个；编号为50的东西
五十的；五十个的；众多的

sentences.english: Standards of living rose in the fifties.
sentences.chinese: 50年代生活水平提高了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 50

name: to
trans: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
(To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.english: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
detailed_translations.english: used to say where someone or something goes

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: Why did she kill her husband?
sentences.chinese: 她为什么杀死丈夫？

sentences.english: Murray held a gun to his head and threatened to kill him.
sentences.chinese: 默里拿枪指着他的头并威胁要杀了他。

sentences.english: Four people were killed when a train plunged into a flooded river.
sentences.chinese: 火车冲进洪水泛滥的河中，造成四人身亡。

sentences.english: Bleach kills household germs.
sentences.chinese: 漂白剂能够杀灭日常病菌。

sentences.english: Smoking kills.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会致人死亡。

sentences.english: The out-of-town shopping centre will kill local trade.
sentences.chinese: 城外的购物中心将令本地商业难以为继。

sentences.english: With time to kill, he took a cab to the centre.
sentences.chinese: 还有点时间可以消磨，于是他叫了一辆出租车去市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or animal die

sentences.english: The women visited cities in seven states.
sentences.chinese: 这些女性访问了七个州的城市。

sentences.english: We close the store at seven (= seven o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们商店七点关门。

sentences.english: ‘How old’s Sam?’ ‘He’s seven (= seven years old ) .’
sentences.chinese: “萨姆多大了？”“他七岁。”

detailed_translations.english: the number 7
the number 7

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

sentences.english: Then all three of you sign the contract and post in on the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 然后你们三个人要都在协议上签名，并把它贴在冰箱上。

sentences.english: I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

sentences.english: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, used for keeping food and drinks cool

sentences.english: a tennis/golf/cricket etc ball
sentences.chinese: 网球/高尔夫球/板球等

sentences.english: Shape the dough into balls
sentences.chinese: 把面团搓成丸子。

sentences.english: The air of the ball began to hum.
sentences.chinese: 舞会的气氛开始活跃起来了。

detailed_translations.english: a round object that is thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport

sentences.english: Ellen flew across the room and greeted her uncle with a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere quickly and suddenly

name: ask
trans: 问，询问；要求；需要；邀请；讨价

sentences.english: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.english: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.english: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.chinese: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.english: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.chinese: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

sentences.english: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.chinese: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

name: scarf
trans: 围巾；嵌接，嵌接处；头巾领巾

sentences.english: Hey, your scarf is slipping off.
sentences.chinese: 喂， 你的围巾快掉了。

sentences.english: The scarf flapped her face.
sentences.chinese: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。

sentences.english: She muffled her throat with a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 她用围巾围住脖子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm

name: development
trans: 发展；开发；发育；住宅小区（专指由同一开发商开发的）；[摄] 显影

sentences.english: child development
sentences.chinese: 儿童发育

sentences.english: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

detailed_translations.english: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced

name: flat
trans: 平的；单调的；不景气的；干脆的；平坦的；扁平的；浅的
（尤指贴着另一表面）平直地；断然地；水平地；直接地，完全地
使变平；[音乐]使（音调）下降，尤指降半音
逐渐变平；[音乐]以降调唱（或奏）

sentences.english: The bed can be folded flat for storage.
sentences.chinese: 这张床可以折扁存放。

sentences.english: He lay flat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他平躺在地板上。

sentences.english: That night I lay flat on my back and stared up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 那一夜，我仰面平躺，眼睛直直地盯着天花板。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平直地； 直截了当地
detailed_translations.english: in a position in which the surface of something is against another surface without curving or sloping

detailed_translations.chinese: 平的；固定的；漏气的；单调的，沉闷的；浅的
detailed_translations.english: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving
a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building

name: below
trans: 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面

sentences.english: an animal that lives below ground
sentences.chinese: 生活在地下的动物

sentences.english: Water was dripping onto the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 水滴到下面的地板上。

sentences.english: I could hear voices in the courtyard below my window.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到院子里有人在我的窗下说话。

sentences.english: They camped a few hundred feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 他们在山峰下面几百英尺的地方扎了营。

sentences.english: Down below, people were talking and laughing.
sentences.chinese: 下面，人们谈笑风生。

sentences.english: Somewhere far below, a door slammed.
sentences.chinese: 下面远远的什么地方有一扇门砰地关上了。

sentences.english: The kitchen is directly below her bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 厨房就在她卧室的正下方。

sentences.english: Captain Parker went below (=  to the lower level of the ship  ) , leaving Clooney in charge.
sentences.chinese: 帕克船长下去了，让克卢尼掌舵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面
detailed_translations.english: in a lower place or position, or on a lower level

name: fantastic
trans: 奇异的；空想的；异想天开的；古怪的；极好的，极出色的；不可思议的；不切实际的

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

name: world
trans: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

name: since
trans: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting here since two o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 我们从两点钟开始就在这里等了。

sentences.english: I haven’t played rugby since I left university.
sentences.chinese: 我大学毕业后就没打过橄榄球。

sentences.english: She left London ten years ago, and I haven’t seen her since.
sentences.chinese: 她十年前离开伦敦，此后我再没有见过她。

sentences.english: The factory has been here since the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂从 20 世纪 70 年代起就在这里了。

sentences.english: It was exactly five years since her father had died.
sentences.chinese: 从她父亲去世到现在正好满五年。

sentences.english: Since the end of the war, over five thousand prisoners have been released.
sentences.chinese: 自从战争结束以后，已有五千多名战俘获释。

sentences.english: He lost his job five years ago, but has since found other work.
sentences.chinese: 他五年前失去工作，但此后找到了其他工作。

sentences.english: I left school in 1995, and since then I’ve lived in London.
sentences.chinese: 我 1995 年离开学校，此后就在伦敦生活。

sentences.english: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released.
sentences.chinese: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

detailed_translations.english: from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time

sentences.english: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
sentences.chinese: 猫躺在沙发上把自己舔干。

sentences.english: The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
sentences.chinese: 工作程序结束，机器会自动关闭。

sentences.english: a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
sentences.chinese: 已发展为业绩喜人的公司的一家小型地方企业

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you!
sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.english: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.english: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.english: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
sentences.chinese: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.english: We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.english: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.english: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.chinese: 几个月以后才真相大白。

detailed_translations.english: all of something
something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit

name: terrible
trans: 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm workers
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

sentences.english: a magazine article
sentences.chinese: 杂志中的文章

sentences.english: She glanced over the magazine racks.
sentences.chinese: 她扫了一眼杂志架。

detailed_translations.english: a large thin book with a paper cover that contains news stories, articles, photographs etc, and is sold weekly or monthly

name: lazy
trans: 懒惰的；懒洋洋的；怠惰的；慢吞吞的

sentences.english: the laziest boy in the class
sentences.chinese: 班上最懒的男孩

sentences.english: He felt too lazy to get out of bed.
sentences.chinese: 他懒得都不想起床。

detailed_translations.english: not liking work and physical activity, or not making any effort to do anything

sentences.english: Dad was up the ladder, repairing the roof.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸在梯子上修补屋顶。

sentences.english: Where can I get my shoes repaired ?
sentences.chinese: 哪儿能修补鞋子？

sentences.english: The church tower is in need of repair.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的塔楼需要修缮。

detailed_translations.english: to fix something that is damaged, broken, split, or not working properly
something that you do to fix a thing that is damaged, broken, or not working

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.english: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.chinese: 学说外语要下功夫。

sentences.english: I'm afraid this essay is a poor effort.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，这篇文章写得不好。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental energy that you need to do sth; sth that takes a lot of energy

sentences.english: Everybody knows Tom.
sentences.chinese: 人人都认识汤姆。

detailed_translations.english: everyone

sentences.english: Union leaders are heading for victory in their battle over workplace rights.
sentences.chinese: 工会领袖们在争取工作场所权利的斗争中正迈向胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you win a battle, game, election, or dispute

name: brown
trans: 棕色的，褐色的；太阳晒黑的

sentences.english: This particular model is available in brown, white, or grey.
sentences.chinese: 这个型号的产品有棕色、白色和灰色的。

sentences.english: the browns and greens of the landscape
sentences.chinese: 棕绿相映的风景

detailed_translations.english: the colour of earth, wood, or coffee

name: bowl
trans: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动

sentences.english: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.chinese: 在碗里装满水。

detailed_translations.english: a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
detailed_translations.english: to travel along very quickly and smoothly

name: nice
trans: 精密的；美好的；细微的；和蔼的

sentences.english: They’ve got a very nice house.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子真漂亮。

sentences.english: Did you have a nice time?
sentences.chinese: 你们玩得开心吗？

sentences.english: It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?
sentences.chinese: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？

sentences.english: What a nice surprise!
sentences.chinese: 真是个惊喜！

sentences.english: One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。

detailed_translations.english: pleasant, attractive, or enjoyable

sentences.english: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

name: pocket
trans: 小型的，袖珍的；金钱上的

sentences.english: Luke came in with his hands in his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 卢克走了进来，双手插在口袋里。

sentences.english: The policeman told me to turn out my pockets (= take everything out of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 警察让我把口袋里的东西都掏出来。

sentences.english: a pocket dictionary
sentences.chinese: 袖珍词典

detailed_translations.english: a type of small bag in or on a coat, trousers etc that you can put money, keys etc in
small enough to be carried in your pocket

sentences.english: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.chinese: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.english: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.chinese: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.english: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

detailed_translations.english: the ninth month of the year, between August and October

name: minute
trans: 分，分钟；片刻，一会儿；备忘录，笔记；会议记录
微小的，详细的 [maɪˈnjuːt; US -ˈnuːt; maɪˋnut]

sentences.english: It takes me ten minutes to walk to work.
sentences.chinese: 我步行上班要用十分钟。

sentences.english: The train arrived at four minutes past eight.
sentences.chinese: 火车于八点零四分到达。

sentences.english: He returned a few minutes later.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟后他回来了。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the car in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 五分钟后我在车那儿和你见面。

sentences.english: Sam thought for a minute, then smiled at his brother.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆想了一下，然后冲着他的兄弟笑了。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour

sentences.english: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
sentences.chinese: 那女人手指上戴着戒指，因此我猜想她已经结婚了。

sentences.english: We ate with our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手抓着吃。

detailed_translations.english: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb

sentences.english: His strange question surprised her.
sentences.chinese: 他那奇怪的问题令她感到意外。

sentences.english: I didn’t know you two knew each other. Mind you, it doesn’t surprise me .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你们俩认识。 尽管如此，我并不感到意外。

sentences.english: What surprised me most was that she didn’t seem to care.
sentences.chinese: 最令我感到意外的是，她好像毫不在乎。

sentences.english: The man had a look of surprise on his face.
sentences.chinese: 那人脸上一副惊讶的表情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使诧异,使惊异,使感到意外
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel surprised
the feeling you have when something unexpected or unusual happens

detailed_translations.english: to talk about something with another person or a group in order to exchange ideas or decide something

sentences.english: Is there enough room for me?
sentences.chinese: 有足够的地方给我吗？

sentences.english: We didn't leave early enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开得不够早。

detailed_translations.english: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’
to the necessary degree

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

name: banana
trans: 香蕉；喜剧演员；大鹰钩鼻

sentences.english: The area is under banana cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区种植香蕉。

sentences.english: The banana bears two crops every year.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉一年收两喷。

sentences.english: He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

detailed_translations.english: a long curved tropical fruit with a yellow skin

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

sentences.english: Copy this page in your notebook.
sentences.chinese: 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上。

sentences.english: She rummaged in the desk drawers for her notebook.
sentences.chinese: 她在书桌抽屉里翻找她的笔记本。

sentences.english: She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.
sentences.chinese: 她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。

detailed_translations.english: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes

sentences.english: They had made an agreement that they would share the profits equally.
sentences.chinese: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.english: Would their discussion result in his agreement to visit his stepmother?
sentences.chinese: 他们商量后，他会不会同意去看望继母？

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement or promise to do something, made by two or more people, companies, organizations etc

name: review
trans: 回顾；复习；评论；检讨；检阅

sentences.english: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes
(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam
the People's Republic of China

name: it
trans: [指无生命的东西、动物、植物]它；这；那

sentences.english: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.english: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.english: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.english: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.chinese: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.english: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: Would you like a cup of tea or coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你想来一杯茶还是咖啡？

sentences.english: Do you take milk and sugar in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你的茶里面要放牛奶和糖吗？

sentences.english: I’d like two teas and a piece of chocolate cake, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要两杯茶和一块巧克力蛋糕。

detailed_translations.english: a hot brown drink made by pouring boiling water onto the dried leaves from a particular Asian bush, or a cup of this drink

sentences.english: The rules are intended to prevent accidents.
sentences.chinese: 这些规定旨在预防事故。

sentences.english: We were prevented from entering the site.
sentences.chinese: 我们被阻止进入现场。

sentences.english: Wrap small ornaments in paper to prevent them being damaged.
sentences.chinese: 把小饰品用纸包上以免损坏。

detailed_translations.english: to stop something from happening, or stop someone from doing something

name: clear
trans: 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的

sentences.english: clear instructions
sentences.chinese: 明确的指示

sentences.english: The question wasn’t very clear.
sentences.chinese: 这问题不是很清楚。

sentences.english: It’s the clearest guide I’ve used.
sentences.chinese: 我从没用过这么清晰易懂的指南。

sentences.english: Perhaps I tried to cover too much and didn’t make myself clear (= express myself well ) .
sentences.chinese: 可能是我涉及的内容太多，没有表达清楚。

sentences.english: If you don’t understand, it’s best to say so and get things clear .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不明白，那就最好照直说并把事情弄清楚。

sentences.english: If I catch you smoking again, you’re grounded. Do I make myself clear (= used when you are angry ) ?
sentences.chinese: 如果再让我发现你抽烟，我就罚你不准出门。我的话你听清楚了吗？

sentences.english: Snowplows have been out clearing the roads.
sentences.chinese: 扫雪机已经出动，去清扫路面了。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a simple and direct way so that people understand
to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it

name: rush
trans: 使冲；突袭；匆忙地做；飞跃

sentences.english: A small girl rushed past her.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩从她身边匆匆经过。

sentences.english: Mo rushed off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 莫匆匆走过走廊。

detailed_translations.english: to move very quickly, especially because you need to be somewhere very soon
to do or decide something too quickly, especially so that you do not have time to do it carefully or well

name: ancient
trans: 古代的；古老的，过时的；年老的

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Asia
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

sentences.english: an ancient walled city
sentences.chinese: 有城墙的古城

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

sentences.english: Rice: No, I only have a handbag.
sentences.chinese: 没有，我只有一个手提包。

sentences.english: He grabbed at her handbag .
sentences.chinese: 他抢夺了她的手提包。

sentences.english: Is this my (your) handbag?
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手提包吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small bag in which a woman carries money and personal things

name: suggest
trans: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

sentences.english: It is a big airline with a large fleet of planes.
sentences.chinese: 这是一家大航空公司，拥有庞大的机群。

sentences.english: It’s much quicker to go by plane.
sentences.chinese: 乘飞机去会快很多。

sentences.english: She slept on the plane.
sentences.chinese: 她在飞机上睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies in the air and has wings and at least one engine

sentences.english: They’ve won their last three games.
sentences.chinese: 他们赢了最近三场比赛。

sentences.english: We’d better go. It’s almost three (= three o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们该走了。快3点了。

sentences.english: My little sister’s only three (= three years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹妹只有3岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 3
the number 3

sentences.english: I smiled a polite greeting, but the woman hardly acknowledged me.
sentences.chinese: 我客气地笑着打了个招呼，可是那女人没有答理我。

sentences.english: The two cousins exchanged greetings (= greeted each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 表兄妹俩互相问候。

detailed_translations.english: something you say or do when you meet someone

sentences.english: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.english: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

sentences.english: Can you repeat your question?
sentences.chinese: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.english: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.chinese: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.english: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.chinese: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.english: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write something again
an event that is very like something that happened before

sentences.english: We always have snow in January.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里1月份总会下雪。

detailed_translations.english: the first month of the year, between December and February

sentences.english: orange juice
sentences.chinese: 橙汁

sentences.english: orange peel
sentences.chinese: 橙子皮

sentences.english: Peel the oranges and divide them into segments.
sentences.chinese: 把橙子去皮，然后切成片。

sentences.english: orange groves (= where orange trees grow )
sentences.chinese: 柑橘园

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

sentences.english: Most seasonal hiring is done in early October.
sentences.chinese: 多数季节性招聘是在10月初进行。

detailed_translations.english: the tenth month of the year, between September and November

sentences.english: During the summer she worked as a lifeguard.
sentences.chinese: 夏天她当过救生员。

sentences.english: He slept calmly during the early part of the night.
sentences.chinese: 他上半夜睡得很安稳。

sentences.english: Foxes remain hidden during the day.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸白天一直躲藏着。

detailed_translations.english: from the beginning to the end of a period of time

name: hamburger
trans: 汉堡包，火腿汉堡；牛肉饼，肉饼；碎牛肉

sentences.english: A hamburger and a coke.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉堡和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: Then have a hamburger.
sentences.chinese: 那么吃一个汉堡吧。

sentences.english: I order a soda and a hamburger for myself. Then another person gets coffee for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗯， 我为自己点了一杯苏打和一个汉堡包， 然后另外一人给我拿了杯咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun

sentences.english: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.chinese: 这个符合你的要求吗？

detailed_translations.english: to be suitable for sth; to match sth

name: something
trans: 重要的人；值得重视的事

sentences.english: There’s something in my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我眼睛里有什么东西。

sentences.english: Sarah said something about coming over later.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉说她等一会儿过来什么的。

sentences.english: I don’t know what he does exactly, but I know it has something to do with computers (= is related to them in some way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他具体是干什么的，只知道和电脑有关。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a particular thing when you do not know its name or do not know exactly what it is

detailed_translations.chinese: 重要的人；值得重视的事

sentences.english: He noticed a woman in a black dress sitting across from him.
sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.english: I didn’t notice any smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我没注意到有烟。

sentences.english: Have you noticed any change in him?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到他有什么变化了吗？

sentences.english: I waved but they took no notice.
sentences.chinese: 我挥了挥手，可是他们没有注意到。

sentences.english: Firefighters were prepared to rush out at a moment’s notice.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员准备着随时出动。

detailed_translations.english: if you notice something or someone, you realize that they exist, especially because you can see, hear, or feel them
when you notice or pay attention to someone or something

sentences.english: a proud man who would not admit his mistakes
sentences.chinese: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

sentences.english: Seth was the proud owner of a new sports car.
sentences.chinese: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骄傲的；自负的〔含贬义〕；自豪的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are more important, skilful etc than you really are – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Several senators introduced legislation aimed at sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 几位参议员提交了针对性骚扰的立法议案。

detailed_translations.english: to formally present a possible new law to be discussed

name: fat
trans: 肥的，胖的；油腻的；丰满的

sentences.english: Are you suggesting I’m too fat?
sentences.chinese: 你是不是在说我太胖了？

sentences.english: a short fat man in his early fifties
sentences.chinese: 一个五十岁出头的矮胖男人

sentences.english: You’ll get fat if you eat all that chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把那些巧克力都吃了，就会变胖的。

sentences.english: He looks much fatter than in his photo.
sentences.chinese: 他看上去比相片上胖多了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 肥的，胖的；油腻的；丰满的
detailed_translations.english: weighing too much because you have too much flesh on your body
a substance that is stored under the skin of people and animals, that helps to keep them warm

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

name: ruler
trans: 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人

sentences.english: a 12-inch ruler
sentences.chinese: 一把12英寸的尺子

detailed_translations.chinese: 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人
detailed_translations.english: someone such as a king or queen who has official power over a country or area

name: study
trans: 学习，研究；课题；书房；学问

sentences.english: Recent studies show that women still get paid a lot less than men.
sentences.chinese: 最近的调查表明，女性的薪水仍比男性的要低很多。

sentences.english: The study was carried out between January and May 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在 2008 年1月到5月间进行的。

sentences.english: Set aside a period of time specifically for study.
sentences.chinese: 留出一段时间专门用于学习

sentences.english: I’ve been studying English for six years
sentences.chinese: 我学英语已有六年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究 (对某一课题或问题的)；中文释义: 学习 (尤指在家里或放学后的)
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is done to find out more about a particular subject or problem, and usually includes a written report

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义: 学习，攻读
detailed_translations.english: to learn about a subject at school, university etc

sentences.english: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.chinese: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.english: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.chinese: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.english: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

detailed_translations.english: confident that you know something or that something is true or correct
used to say ‘yes’ to someone

sentences.english: He craved the teacher's pardon.
sentences.chinese: 他恳求老师原谅他。

sentences.english: I earnestly pray for your pardon.
sentences.chinese: 我恳切地请求你原谅。

sentences.english: I hope you will pardon me for doing so.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你原谅我这样做。

detailed_translations.english: to forgive someone for behaving badly
used to say ‘sorry’ after you have made an impolite sound such as a  burp

sentences.english: Has anything been decided yet?
sentences.chinese: 已经作出什么决定了吗？

sentences.english: The trainees decide among themselves what programs to take.
sentences.chinese: 受训者自行选择课程。

sentences.english: After a long discussion, they decided in favour of (= chose ) the older applicant.
sentences.chinese: 经过长时间的讨论，他们决定选那位较年长的求职者。

detailed_translations.english: to make a choice or judgment about something, especially after considering all the possibilities or arguments

sentences.english: Inge kept a diary (= wrote in a diary ) during the war years.
sentences.chinese: 英奇在战争年代里一直写日记。

detailed_translations.english: a book in which you write down the things that happen to you each day

sentences.english: Mary loves her grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽很疼爱她的孙子孙女们。

detailed_translations.english: the child of your son or daughter

sentences.english: His playing is technically brilliant, but it doesn’t excite me.
sentences.chinese: 他的演奏技巧娴熟，但并不让我激动。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager

name: square
trans: 平方的；正方形的；直角的；正直的

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.chinese: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.english: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.chinese: 她住在汉诺威广场。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

name: CD
trans: 光盘，激光唱片（Compact Disc）；呼叫设备（Calling Device）；中央地区（Central District）；商务部（Commerce Department）

detailed_translations.chinese: 光盘，激光唱片（Compact Disc）；呼叫设备（Calling Device）；中央地区（Central District）；商务部（Commerce Department）

sentences.english: the story of life on a small farm at the turn of the century
sentences.chinese: 讲述世纪初一个小农场生活的故事

detailed_translations.english: one of the 100-year periods measured from before or after the year of Christ’s birth

name: suppose
trans: 假设；认为；让（虚拟语气）；推想

sentences.english: There were many more deaths than was first supposed.
sentences.chinese: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.english: There's no reason to suppose (= it is unlikely that ) he’s lying.
sentences.chinese: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know

name: mention
trans: 提到，谈到；提及，论及；说起

sentences.english: Was my name mentioned at all?
sentences.chinese: 我的名字被提到过吗？

sentences.english: Some of the problems were mentioned in his report.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些问题在他的报告里提到了。

sentences.english: (= it is important enough to mention ) that they only studied a very small number of cases.
sentences.chinese: 必须说明的是他们仅研究了几个个案。

sentences.english: As I mentioned earlier , there have been a lot of changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 正如我刚才所说的，最近变化很大。

sentences.english: She mentioned in passing (= mentioned in a quick unimportant way ) that you had just been to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 她只是随口提了一下你刚刚去过罗马。

sentences.english: They all get a mention (= they are all mentioned ) in the book.
sentences.chinese: 他们在书中全都被提到了。

detailed_translations.english: to talk or write about something or someone, usually quickly and without saying very much or giving details
when someone mentions something or someone in a conversation, piece of writing etc

sentences.english: You'd better encash your motorcycle at once.
sentences.chinese: 你最好马上卖掉摩托车换成现款。

sentences.english: She can ride a motorcycle， to say nothing of a bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 她摩托车都会骑， 自行车更不在话下了。

sentences.english: He runs behind a motorcycle for half an hour every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他每天早晨跟在摩托车后面跑半个小时。

detailed_translations.english: a fast two-wheeled vehicle with an engine

name: radio

detailed_translations.english: used after verbs, nouns, and adjectives to introduce a  clause  which shows what someone says or thinks, or states a fact or reason

detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, especially when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.chinese: 不知谁的汽车警报器吵得我整晚都无法入睡。

sentences.chinese: “我们能请谁来看小孩呢？”“我会叫苏齐或别的什么人。”

if an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening

sentences.english: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.

sentences.english: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.english: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true

sentences.english: Divide it into thirds.
sentences.chinese: 把它分成三等份。

detailed_translations.english: one of three equal parts of something
coming after two other things in a series

sentences.english: a baseball cap
sentences.chinese: 棒球帽

sentences.english: a bottle cap
sentences.chinese: 瓶盖

sentences.english: a graceful tower capped with a golden dome
sentences.chinese: 一座漂亮的金色圆顶塔

detailed_translations.english: a type of flat hat that has a curved part sticking out at the front, and is often worn as part of a uniform
to have a particular substance on top

name: law
trans: 法律；规律；法治；法学；诉讼；司法界

sentences.english: Elected officials ought to obey the law.
sentences.chinese: 民选官员理应遵守法律。

sentences.english: laws passed by Parliament
sentences.chinese: 议会通过的法律

detailed_translations.english: the whole system of rules that people in a particular country or area must obey

sentences.english: children shouting and running in the playground
sentences.chinese: 在操场上叫嚷奔跑的孩子们

detailed_translations.english: an area for children to play, especially at a school or in a park, that often has special equipment for climbing on, riding on etc

name: cold
trans: 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.english: a blast of cold air
sentences.chinese: 一股冷空气

sentences.english: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.english: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.chinese: 我冷得发抖。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

name: thread
trans: 线；螺纹；思路；衣服；线状物；玻璃纤维；路线

sentences.english: I’m looking for a needle and thread.
sentences.chinese: 我在找针线。

sentences.english: hand-sewn with gold and silver thread
sentences.chinese: 用金线和银线手工缝制的

sentences.english: His mind wandered, and he lost the thread of what she was saying (= was no longer able to understand it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他走神了，跟不上她的思路。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin string of cotton, silk etc used to sew or weave cloth

sentences.english: the iron and steel industry
sentences.chinese: 钢铁工业

sentences.english: a driveway with large iron gates
sentences.chinese: 安装了大铁门的私家车道

sentences.english: the absorption of iron from food
sentences.chinese: 对食物中铁的吸收

sentences.english: ...a man of icy nerve and iron will.
sentences.chinese: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

detailed_translations.english: a common hard metal that is used to make steel, is  magnetic  , and is found in very small quantities in food and blood. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Fe
to make clothes smooth using an iron
You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well

sentences.english: six months ago
sentences.chinese: 六个月前

sentences.english: She arrived just after six (= six o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 她六点刚过就到了。

sentences.english: He learnt to play the violin when he was six (= six years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他六岁学拉小提琴。

detailed_translations.english: the number 6
the number 6

sentences.english: I knocked and knocked but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我把门敲了又敲，但无人回应。

sentences.english: He got a nasty knock on the head.
sentences.chinese: 他头部遭到重重一击。

detailed_translations.english: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
a sharp blow from sth hard

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art in New York
sentences.chinese: 纽约现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: an example of early Indian art
sentences.chinese: 印度早期艺术的范例

sentences.english: Television is ruining the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 电视在糟蹋会话艺术。

detailed_translations.english: the use of painting, drawing,  sculpture  etc to represent things or express ideas

name: hurry
trans: 仓促（做某事）；催促；（朝某方向）迅速移动；迅速处理

sentences.english: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.english: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.english: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

detailed_translations.english: to do something or go somewhere more quickly than usual, especially because there is not much time
to make someone do something more quickly

sentences.english: There are many different cell types in the human body .
sentences.chinese: 人体中有许多种不同的细胞类型。

sentences.english: the power of the human mind
sentences.chinese: 人脑的威力

sentences.english: The desire for joy lies deep within the human spirit .
sentences.chinese: 对快乐的渴求藏在人类心灵深处。

sentences.english: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.english: theories of human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 关于人类行为的理论

sentences.english: different areas of human experience
sentences.chinese: 人类各方面的经验

sentences.english: respect for the absolute value of human life
sentences.chinese: 对人类生命绝对价值的尊重

sentences.english: The accident was the result of human error.
sentences.chinese: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.english: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.chinese: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.english: Like humans, cats and dogs are omnivores.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，猫和狗是杂食性动物。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to people, especially as opposed to machines or animals
a person

sentences.english: She covered her face, rocking to and fro in her grief.
sentences.chinese: 她捂住脸，悲痛得身体不住地来回晃动。

sentences.english: The waves rocked the boat from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 波浪使小船左摇右晃。

sentences.english: Paul sat gently rocking the child in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 保罗坐着，轻轻摇晃怀里的孩子。

sentences.english: Jim rocked with laughter when he heard what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆听了发生的事情后笑得前仰后合。

detailed_translations.english: to move gently backwards and forwards or from side to side, or to make something do this
a type of popular modern music with a strong loud beat, played using  guitar s  and drums

name: another
trans: 又一，另一；另外的；不同的

sentences.english: They must have returned by another route.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定是从另一条路线回来的。

detailed_translations.english: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one

name: recorder
trans: 录音机；记录器；记录员；八孔直笛

sentences.english: Rodney put the recorder on the desk top and pushed the play button.
sentences.chinese: 罗德尼把录音机放在桌面上，按下了播放键。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that records music, films etc

sentences.english: At least eighteen bullets were fired.
sentences.chinese: 至少射出了18颗子弹。

sentences.english: Jim was eighteen (= 18 years old ).
sentences.chinese: 吉姆18岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 18
the number 18

sentences.english: She recited a poem that she had learnt at school.
sentences.chinese: 她背诵了一首学校里学的诗。

detailed_translations.english: to say a poem, piece of literature etc that you have learned, for people to listen to

name: kind
trans: 和蔼的；宽容的；令人感激的

sentences.english: Get me a sandwich – any kind will do.
sentences.chinese: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

detailed_translations.english: one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group

name: cloudy
trans: 多云的；阴天的；愁容满面的

sentences.english: a cloudy night with some light rain
sentences.chinese: 伴有些许小雨的多云的夜晚

sentences.english: Tomorrow, it will be cloudy and cool.
sentences.chinese: 明天多云，天气凉爽。

detailed_translations.english: a cloudy sky, day etc is dark because there are a lot of clouds

name: background
trans: 背景的；发布背景材料的

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

name: age
trans: 年龄；时代；寿命，使用年限；阶段

sentences.english: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.english: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.english: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

sentences.english: We are living in the age of technology.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.english: He was worried to see how much she’d aged.
sentences.chinese: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

detailed_translations.english: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older

name: name
trans: 命名，任命；指定；称呼；提名；叫出

sentences.english: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.english: What’s your name?
sentences.chinese: 你叫什么名字？

sentences.english: He didn’t want to do anything to damage the good name of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他不想做任何有损公司良好声誉的事。

sentences.english: They’re a lot better than some airlines I could name.
sentences.chinese: 他们比我叫得上名字的一些航空公司要好得多。

detailed_translations.english: what someone is called
to say what the name of someone or something is, especially officially

sentences.english: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.chinese: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

detailed_translations.english: to put something with something else or with a group of other things

name: year
trans: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: He visits his dad in prison every week.
sentences.chinese: 他每周都去探望狱中的父亲。

sentences.english: Ricky has been out of prison for three years now.
sentences.chinese: 里基现已出狱三年。

sentences.english: They’ll probably put him in prison for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 他们很可能会让他在监狱里待很长时间。

sentences.english: Helen was sent to prison for attacking a man with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 海伦因持刀袭击一名男子而被送入监狱。

sentences.english: The two men were arrested only a week after they were released from prison .
sentences.chinese: 那两名男子从监狱获释后仅仅一周就被捕了。

sentences.english: Three terrorists escaped from Brixton Prison .
sentences.chinese: 有三名恐怖分子从布里克斯顿监狱越狱了。

sentences.english: an increase in the number of women going to prison
sentences.chinese: 入狱女性人数的增多

sentences.english: Mr Gunn received a ten year prison sentence .
sentences.chinese: 冈恩先生获刑十年。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people are kept as a punishment for a crime, or while they are waiting to go to court for their  trial

name: sentence
trans: [语][计] 句子，命题；宣判，判决

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子有点短。

sentences.english: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the lower half of your body, with a separate part fitting over each leg

name: anyway
trans: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

sentences.english: I know I'll be confronted with difficulties, but I will squeak by anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我会遇到许多困难，可我无论如何总能应付过去。

detailed_translations.english: used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement

name: light
trans: 光；光线；灯；打火机；领悟；浅色；天窗
轻的；浅色的；明亮的；轻松的；容易的；清淡的

sentences.english: You can carry this bag – it’s fairly light.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.english: You should wear light, comfortable shoes.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

sentences.english: The truck was quite light and easy to drive.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.english: people who have suffered only light exposure to radiation
sentences.chinese: 只受到轻度辐射的人

detailed_translations.english: not very heavy

name: offer
trans: 提议；出价；意图；录取通知书

sentences.english: Can I offer you something to drink?
sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.english: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.chinese: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone if they would like to have something, or to hold something out to them so that they can take it
a statement saying that you are willing to do something for someone or give them something

sentences.english: laws about dangerous dogs
sentences.chinese: 有关危险犬类的法律

sentences.english: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.english: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.chinese: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

detailed_translations.english: able or likely to harm or kill you

sentences.english: We painted the door bright red .
sentences.chinese: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.english: a red balloon
sentences.chinese: 一个红气球

sentences.english: I like the way the artist uses red in this painting.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢画家在这幅作品中对红色的运用。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of blood
the colour of blood

name: kilometer
trans: [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米（等于kilometre）

sentences.english: She had to battle snowstorms, landslides, snakes and loneliness on her 350 kilometer journey.
sentences.chinese: 在350公里的行程中，她要克服暴风雪、滑坡、蛇和孤独寂寞。

sentences.english: But it says food grown and harvested in the 30-kilometer exclusion zone after the emergency might be contaminated and should be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 但是，该组织说，事故发生后，在30公里禁区内种植和收获的食物可能受到污染，应该避免食用。

sentences.english: For example, the researchers last week said they had managed to gather enough energy from a TV station a half-kilometer away to power a small temperature sensor.
sentences.chinese: 例如，研究人员上周说，他们已经设法从半公里远的一座电视发射台收集了足够了能量给一个小型温度传感器供电。

detailed_translations.chinese: [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米（等于kilometre）

sentences.english: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲列强在亚洲扩大他们的管辖权。

sentences.english: The teacher chalked out a map of Asia on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 老师用粉笔在黑板上画了一张亚洲地图。

sentences.english: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍。

sentences.english: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.english: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.chinese: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.english: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

sentences.english: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 这水温游泳正好。

sentences.english: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 水在100摄氏度沸腾。

sentences.english: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
sentences.chinese: 护士给我量了体温。

detailed_translations.english: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is

sentences.english: medical research
sentences.chinese: 医学研究

sentences.english: medical staff
sentences.chinese: 医务人员

sentences.english: a medical student
sentences.chinese: 医科学生

sentences.english: a patient’s medical history
sentences.chinese: 患者的病史

sentences.english: medical or surgical treatment
sentences.chinese: 内科或外科疗法

detailed_translations.english: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury

sentences.english: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

sentences.english: nature conservation
sentences.chinese: 自然保护

sentences.english: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.chinese: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

sentences.english: I tried appealing to his better nature (= his feelings of kindness ) but he wouldn’t agree to help us.
sentences.chinese: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.english: Capitalist society is by its very nature unstable.
sentences.chinese: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

detailed_translations.english: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather

sentences.english: We still lack a pair of chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 还少一双筷子。

sentences.english: Before lunch he learned the foreigner how to use chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 午饭前他教那个外国人怎样使筷子。

sentences.english: If you want your friend to try something they should pick it up from your plate with their own chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想让你的朋友尝尝某道菜时，应该让他们用他们自己的筷子从你的盘中夹。

sentences.english: The population increased dramatically in the first half of the century.
sentences.chinese: 该世纪上半叶，人口大幅度增加。

sentences.english: political tensions that might increase the likelihood of war
sentences.chinese: 或许会增加战争爆发可能性的紧张政治局面

sentences.english: Visits to the site have increased threefold since May.
sentences.chinese: 来这里的参观者自5月起已增至原来的三倍。

sentences.english: an increase in spending
sentences.chinese: 开支的增长

detailed_translations.english: to become or to make sth greater in amount, number, value, etc.
a rise in the amount, number or value of sth

name: conference
trans: 会议；讨论；协商；联盟；（正式）讨论会；[工会、工党用语]（每年的）大会

sentences.english: Representatives from over 100 countries attended the International Peace Conference in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 来自一百多个国家的代表出席了在日内瓦举行的国际和平大会。

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting where a lot of people discuss important matters such as business, politics, or science, especially for several days

sentences.english: It’s important to give children plenty of praise and encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 对小孩子多加表扬和鼓励是很重要的。

sentences.english: Her teacher was full of praise for her work.
sentences.chinese: 老师对她的作业赞不绝口。

sentences.english: Gregory was singled out (= he was chosen in particular ) for special praise .

sentences.english: The film has won praise from audiences and critics alike.

sentences.english: Jane was praised by her teacher.

detailed_translations.english: words that you say or write in order to praise someone or something
to say that you admire and approve of someone or something, especially publicly

sentences.english: I’ve never lived abroad before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未在国外生活过。

sentences.english: She often goes abroad on business.
sentences.chinese: 她经常出国公干。

sentences.english: goods imported from abroad

sentences.chinese: 有关哈利·波特的书在国内外一直都很流行。

detailed_translations.english: in or to a foreign country

name: nor
trans: (Nor)人名；(中)挪(广东话·威妥玛)；(马来、俄)诺尔；(柬)诺

sentences.chinese: 他既不会读也不会写。

sentences.chinese: 马特和朱莉都没有说什么。

sentences.english: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.chinese: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh

sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

name: agree
trans: 同意，赞成；承认；约定，商定

sentences.english: Teenagers and their parents rarely agree.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子跟父母意见很少一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express the same opinion about something as someone else

sentences.english: Can I ask you a question?
sentences.chinese: 我能问你个问题吗？

sentences.english: I’m afraid I can’t answer that question.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕无法回答那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: a sentence, phrase or word that asks for information

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.english: a fighter pilot
sentences.chinese: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.english: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .

sentences.english: The plan is to launch a pilot programme next summer.

A pilot plan or a pilot project is one that is used to test an idea before deciding whether to introduce it on a larger scale
to guide an aircraft, spacecraft, or ship as its pilot

sentences.english: When we were children, our father read aloud to us.
sentences.chinese: 当我们是孩子时，我们的父亲大声地朗读给我们听。

sentences.chinese: 她被判入狱11个月。

sentences.chinese: 我从不在11点钟以前上床睡觉。

sentences.english: James had worked every summer since he was eleven (= 11 years old ).

detailed_translations.english: the number
the number

name: boring
trans: 钻孔；使厌烦；挖空（bore的ing形式）

sentences.chinese: 她丈夫可以说是我见过的最无聊的人。

detailed_translations.english: not interesting in any way

name: cruel
trans: 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的，让人受难的；无情的，严酷的

sentences.chinese: 他的死是个无情的打击。
